- AI-powered recruit matching
- Video analysis integration
- Parent portal access
- Multi-language support
- Export to PDF/print
- QR code sharing
- NFC business card integration

---

## Conclusion

This design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.

**Key Success Metrics:**
- Profile completion rate > 85%
- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
- Message conversion rate > 15%
- Mobile performance score > 90

**Design Principles Summary:**
1. Clear information hierarchy
2. Mobile-first responsive design
3. Accessibility as core feature
4. Performance optimization
5. Consistent user experience
6. Scalable component system

---

## Appendix

### Related Files
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/Coach.swift` - Existing coach model
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/School.swift` - School model reference
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Profile/ProfileView.swift` - Athlete profile pattern
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Auth/CollegeCoachProfileSetupView.swift` - Onboarding flow

### Design Resources
- SF Symbols catalog: https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols/
- Human Interface Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/
- WCAG 2.1 Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/

### Contact
For questions or clarifications about this design system, consult the ATHLEAD design team or reference the existing profile implementations in the codebase.

---

**Document Version:** 1.0
**Last Updated:** 2025-10-05
**Author:** UI/UX Design Team
**Status:** Ready for Implementation

# College Coach Profile System - UI/UX Design Document
## ATHLEAD Recruiting Platform

---

## Executive Summary

This document outlines the comprehensive UI/UX design for a dual-profile system for college coaches in the ATHLEAD recruiting platform. The system enables coaches to manage both a personal coaching profile and a sport-specific program profile, providing athletes with detailed information about both the coach and the athletic program they represent.

---

## Table of Contents

1. [Design Philosophy](#design-philosophy)
2. [User Flows](#user-flows)
3. [Profile Architecture](#profile-architecture)
4. [Personal Coach Profile](#personal-coach-profile)
5. [Program Profile](#program-profile)
6. [Navigation Patterns](#navigation-patterns)
7. [Component Specifications](#component-specifications)
8. [Data Models](#data-models)
9. [SwiftUI Implementation Guide](#swiftui-implementation-guide)
10. [View Modes](#view-modes)
11. [Accessibility Considerations](#accessibility-considerations)

---

## Design Philosophy

### Core Principles

1. **Dual Identity**: Clear separation between coach as individual and program as entity
2. **Contextual Switching**: Seamless navigation between personal and program profiles
3. **Recruiter-Athlete Focus**: Information architecture optimized for recruiting conversations
4. **Visual Hierarchy**: Sport-specific branding while maintaining platform consistency
5. **Transparency**: Comprehensive program information to build trust with recruits

### Design Language

- **Platform**: iOS-native SwiftUI implementation
- **Visual Style**: Professional recruiting aesthetic with athletic program branding
- **Color System**: Platform primary colors + program-specific accent colors
- **Typography**: SF Pro for system text, emphasis on hierarchy
- **Spacing**: Consistent 8px grid system (matching existing ATHLEAD design)

---

## User Flows

### Primary User Journey

```
Coach Login
    |
    v
Profile Hub (Landing)
    |
    +---> Personal Coach Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> Edit Personal Info
    |         +---> View as Athlete Sees
    |         +---> Credentials & Bio
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Edit Program Info
              +---> Manage Roster
              +---> Update Facilities
              +---> Post Achievements
              +---> View as Athlete Sees
```

### Athlete Viewing Journey

```
Athlete Search/Browse
    |
    v
Coach Discovery
    |
    +---> Coach Personal Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> View Credentials
    |         +---> Message Coach
    |         +---> See Associated Program
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Explore Team Culture
              +---> View Facilities
              +---> See Current Roster
              +---> Check Academic Resources
              +---> Contact Coaching Staff
```

---

## Profile Architecture

### Profile Hub Landing

The Profile Hub serves as the central navigation point for coaches to manage both profiles.

#### Layout Structure

```

   [Back]      Profile Hub      []  <- Navigation Bar

                                       
     
      Coach Profile Photo            <- Header Section
      Dr. Sarah Johnson            
      Head Coach - Volleyball      
      University of Texas          
     
                                       
      
       Personal Profile            <- Quick Action Cards
     View and manage your           
     coaching credentials           
                         []        
      
                                       
      
       UT Volleyball Program      
     Manage your team's             
     recruiting presence            
                         []        
      
                                       
   Recent Activity                     <- Activity Feed
    5 new athlete views today        
    2 messages from prospects        
    Program profile updated          
                                       

```

#### Component Breakdown

**Header Section**
- Circular profile photo (120pt diameter)
- Coach name (Title2, Bold)
- Position and sport (Subheadline, Secondary color)
- Institution name (Footnote, Tertiary color)
- Semi-transparent card background with blur effect

**Profile Type Cards**
- Full-width cards with subtle border
- Icon + Title + Description layout
- Chevron right indicator
- Tap target: entire card
- Background: `.systemGray6` with corner radius 16pt
- Padding: 20pt all sides
- Spacing between cards: 16pt

---

## Personal Coach Profile

### Purpose
The personal coach profile showcases the individual's credentials, experience, and professional identity.

### Layout Design

```

  []   Coach Profile         [Edit]   <- Navigation

                                       
    <- Hero Section
     [Background: Program Colors]       (Gradient overlay)
                                      
                     
       Profile                     
       Photo                       
                     
                                      
     Dr. Sarah Johnson               
     Head Volleyball Coach           
     University of Texas             
      [Message]  [Connect]       
   
                                       
    <- Stats Bar
    15 Years    3 Titles   NCAA I  
    Experience  Won        Division 
   
                                       
   About                              <- Sections
      (Expandable)
   Passionate volleyball coach with  
   15+ years experience developing   
   championship programs...          
   
                                       
   Credentials & Education           
   
    M.S. Exercise Science          
      University of Michigan         
                                      
    AVCA Certified                 
      Advanced Coaching License      
                                      
    CAA Level 3 Certification      
   
                                       
   Coaching Philosophy               
   
   My coaching philosophy centers    
   on developing the whole athlete.. 
   
                                       
   Career Highlights                 
   
    2022 Big 12 Coach of Year       
    3x Conference Championships     
    15 All-Americans Coached        
    98% Graduation Rate             
   
                                       
   Associated Program                
   
     UT Volleyball Program         
    View full program profile  []   
   
                                       
   Contact Information               
   
    s.johnson@athletics.utexas.edu 
    (512) 555-0100                 
    Anna Hiss Gymnasium            
   
                                       

```

### Section Specifications

#### Hero Section
- **Height**: 350pt
- **Background**: Program-branded gradient (customizable)
- **Profile Photo**:
  - Size: 120pt diameter
  - Border: 4pt white stroke
  - Shadow: subtle drop shadow
  - Position: Center, 100pt from top
- **Name Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Display, Bold, 28pt
  - Color: White
- **Title Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Semibold, 16pt
  - Color: White 90% opacity
- **Institution Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Regular, 14pt
  - Color: White 80% opacity
- **Action Buttons**:
  - Style: Pill buttons
  - Background: White 20% opacity, blur effect
  - Text: White
  - Icons: SF Symbols
  - Spacing: 12pt between buttons

#### Stats Bar
- **Layout**: 3-column grid
- **Background**: White with 95% opacity
- **Border**: 1pt gray stroke, corner radius 12pt
- **Cell Layout**:
  - Top: Large number (24pt, Bold)
  - Bottom: Label (12pt, Secondary color)
  - Dividers: 1pt vertical lines between cells
- **Padding**: 16pt vertical, edge-to-edge horizontal

#### Content Sections
All sections follow consistent pattern:
- **Header**:
  - Chevron indicator (expandable/collapsible)
  - Title: 18pt, Semibold
  - Padding: 16pt vertical
- **Card Background**:
  - Color: `.systemBackground`
  - Border: 1pt `.separator` color
  - Corner radius: 12pt
  - Padding: 20pt
  - Shadow: subtle elevation
- **Content Spacing**: 12pt between items

---

## Program Profile

### Purpose
The program profile is the sport-specific showcase that represents the entire athletic program, facilities, team culture, and recruiting opportunities.

### Layout Design

```

  []  Program Profile        [Edit]   <- Navigation

                                       
    <- Hero Banner
     [Stadium/Facility Photo]           (Full-width image)
                                      
                          
      Program                      
       Logo                        
                          
                                      
     University of Texas             
     Volleyball Program              
                                      
      Big 12 Conference            
     Division I - NCAA               
   
                                       
      <- Quick Stats
    Founded     Conf.      Nat.    
     1975      Titles: 8  Rank:5   
     
                                       
      <- Tab Navigation
   Overview  Roster  Facilities    
     
                                       
   Program Overview                   <- Content Sections
   
   The University of Texas           
   volleyball program is one of...   
   
                                       
   Recent Achievements               
   
    2023 Big 12 Champions          
    NCAA Tournament Sweet 16       
    #5 National Ranking            
   
                                       
   Program Culture & Values          
   
   Excellence  Teamwork  Integrity 
                                      
   We develop champions on and       
   off the court...                  
   
                                       
   Recruiting Priorities             
   
   Class of 2025                     
     
     Middle Blocker (Priority)   
     Outside Hitter              
     Setter                      
     
                                      
   Class of 2026                     
     
     Libero (Priority)           
     Outside Hitter              
     
   
                                       
   Academic Support                  
   
    Academic Excellence Center     
    Dedicated study halls           
    Individual tutoring             
    Career counseling               
                                      
    Team Academic Stats            
    3.6 Average GPA                 
    100% Graduation Rate            
    12 Academic All-Americans       
   
                                       
   Coaching Staff                    
   
    Dr. Sarah Johnson      [] 
       Head Coach                 
    15 years experience         
                                      
    Mike Anderson          [] 
       Assistant Coach            
    8 years experience          
                                      
    Lisa Chen              [] 
       Recruiting Coordinator     
    5 years experience          
   
                                       
   Facilities                        
   
   [Photo Gallery - Horizontal]      
                                      
    Gregory Gymnasium               
    4,000 seat capacity             
    State-of-art video system       
    Practice courts: 3              
                                      
    Longhorn Training Center       
    Dedicated strength facility     
    Sports medicine clinic          
    Recovery pools & equipment      
   
                                       
   Schedule & Results                
   
   2024 Season: 24-6 (14-2 Conf.)   
                                      
   Recent Matches                    
    W vs. Baylor      3-1           
    W vs. Kansas      3-0

   [Horizontal scroll cards]         
               
    Pro   Pro  Coach          
               
   
                                       

```

### Roster Tab Layout

```

  Overview  ROSTER  Facilities        <- Active Tab

                                       
  Current Roster (2024-25)            
   
   Filter: [All] [Class] [Position]  
   
                                       
   Seniors (4)                       
     
     #12 Emma Rodriguez           
       Outside Hitter               
     6'1"  Dallas, TX             
                                
     
  [Similar cards for other players]

   Sophomores (4)

    Interested in joining?

```

### Player Card Component

```

   #12 Emma Rodriguez          
       Outside Hitter              
 Photo 6'1"  Dallas, TX

 Kills: 285  Blocks: 52  Aces: 31

```

### Facilities Tab Layout

```

  Overview  Roster  FACILITIES        <- Active Tab
```

---

## Navigation Patterns

### Profile Switching

**Method 1: Profile Hub (Recommended)**
- Central hub accessed from Profile tab
- Visual cards for each profile type
- Clear separation of contexts

**Method 2: Segmented Control**
```

    
    Personal    Program Profile   
    

  [Profile content based on selection] 

```

**Method 3: Contextual Linking**
- Cross-link between profiles
- "View Associated Program" button on personal profile
- "Meet the Coaching Staff" on program profile

### Navigation Hierarchy

```
Main Tab Bar
 Feed
 Search
 AI Assistant
 Messages
 Profile (College Coach)
     Profile Hub (Landing)
        Personal Coach Profile
           Edit Personal Info
           View as Athlete
           Settings
       
        Program Profile
            Edit Program Info
            Manage Roster
            Update Facilities
            Post Updates
            View as Athlete
    
     Settings
```

### Transitions

**Profile Hub to Profile**
- Push navigation (slide from right)
- Maintains navigation stack
- Back button returns to hub

**Between Personal and Program**
- Cross-fade transition
- Maintains scroll position preference
- Smooth visual continuity

**Edit Mode**
- Modal presentation (sheet)
- Full-screen on iPhone
- Card style on iPad
- Dismiss gesture enabled

---

## Component Specifications

### Design System Components

#### Color Palette

```swift
// Base Platform Colors
struct ATHLEADColors {
    static let primary = Color(hex: "#2563EB")      // Blue
    static let secondary = Color(hex: "#10B981")    // Green
    static let accent = Color(hex: "#F59E0B")       // Amber
    static let error = Color(hex: "#EF4444")        // Red

    // Background
    static let background = Color(.systemBackground)
    static let secondaryBackground = Color(.secondarySystemBackground)
    static let tertiaryBackground = Color(.tertiarySystemBackground)

    // Text
    static let textPrimary = Color(.label)
    static let textSecondary = Color(.secondaryLabel)
    static let textTertiary = Color(.tertiaryLabel)

    // Borders
    static let border = Color(.separator)
    static let divider = Color(.separator).opacity(0.5)
}

// Program-Specific Colors (Customizable)
struct ProgramColors {
    var primary: Color      // Team primary color
    var secondary: Color    // Team secondary color
    var gradient: [Color]   // Hero gradient
}
```

#### Typography Scale

```swift
struct ATHLEADTypography {
    // Headings
    static let largeTitle = Font.system(size: 34, weight: .bold)
    static let title1 = Font.system(size: 28, weight: .bold)
    static let title2 = Font.system(size: 22, weight: .bold)
    static let title3 = Font.system(size: 20, weight: .semibold)

    // Body
    static let body = Font.system(size: 17, weight: .regular)
    static let bodyBold = Font.system(size: 17, weight: .semibold)
    static let callout = Font.system(size: 16, weight: .regular)

    // Small
    static let subheadline = Font.system(size: 15, weight: .regular)
    static let footnote = Font.system(size: 13, weight: .regular)
    static let caption1 = Font.system(size: 12, weight: .regular)
    static let caption2 = Font.system(size: 11, weight: .regular)
}
```

#### Spacing System

```swift
struct Spacing {
    static let xs: CGFloat = 4
    static let sm: CGFloat = 8
    static let md: CGFloat = 16
    static let lg: CGFloat = 24
    static let xl: CGFloat = 32
    static let xxl: CGFloat = 48
}
```

#### Border Radius

```swift
struct CornerRadius {
    static let small: CGFloat = 8
    static let medium: CGFloat = 12
    static let large: CGFloat = 16
    static let xlarge: CGFloat = 24
}
```

### Reusable Components

#### Profile Card Component

```swift
struct ProfileCard: View {
    let title: String
    let icon: String
    let description: String
    let action: () -> Void

    var body: some View {
        Button(action: action) {
            HStack(spacing: 16) {
                Image(systemName: icon)
                    .font(.system(size: 24))
                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
                    .frame(width: 50, height: 50)
                    .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                    .clipShape(Circle())

                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                    Text(title)
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    Text(description)
                        .font(.subheadline)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        .lineLimit(2)
                }

                Spacer()

                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
            }
            .padding(20)
            .background(Color(.systemGray6))
            .cornerRadius(16)
        }
        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
    }
}
```

#### Section Header Component

```swift
struct SectionHeader: View {
    let title: String
    @Binding var isExpanded: Bool

    var body: some View {
        Button(action: {
            withAnimation(.spring()) {
                isExpanded.toggle()
            }
        }) {
            HStack {
                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                    .rotationEffect(.degrees(isExpanded ? 90 : 0))
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                Text(title)
                    .font(.title3)
                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)

                Spacer()
            }
            .padding(.vertical, 12)
        }
        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
    }
}
```

#### Info Row Component

```swift
struct InfoRow: View {
    let icon: String
    let iconColor: Color
    let label: String
    let value: String

    var body: some View {
        HStack(spacing: 16) {
            Image(systemName: icon)
                .foregroundColor(.white)
                .frame(width: 40, height: 40)
                .background(iconColor.opacity(0.8))
                .clipShape(Circle())

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                Text(label)
                    .font(.caption)
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                Text(value)
                    .font(.body)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
            }

            Spacer()
        }
    }
}
```

#### Stats Pill Component

```swift
struct StatsPill: View {
    let value: String
    let label: String

    var body: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 4) {
            Text(value)
                .font(.system(size: 24, weight: .bold))
                .foregroundColor(.primary)

            Text(label)
                .font(.caption)
                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
        }
        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
    }
}
```

#### Achievement Badge Component

```swift
struct AchievementBadge: View {
    let icon: String
    let title: String
    let subtitle: String

    var body: some View {
        HStack(spacing: 12) {
            Text(icon)
                .font(.system(size: 32))

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 2) {
                Text(title)
                    .font(.body)
                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)

                Text(subtitle)
                    .font(.caption)
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
            }

            Spacer()
        }
        .padding(16)
        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
        .cornerRadius(12)
    }
}
```

#### Recruiting Priority Card

```swift
struct RecruitingPriorityCard: View {
    let position: String
    let isPriority: Bool

    var body: some View {
        HStack {
            Image(systemName: "figure.volleyball")
                .foregroundColor(.blue)

            Text(position)
                .font(.body)
                .foregroundColor(.primary)

            Spacer()

            if isPriority {
                Text("PRIORITY")
                    .font(.caption2)
                    .fontWeight(.bold)
                    .foregroundColor(.white)
                    .padding(.horizontal, 8)
                    .padding(.vertical, 4)
                    .background(Color.orange)
                    .cornerRadius(4)
            }
        }
        .padding(12)
        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
        .cornerRadius(8)
    }
}
```

---

## Data Models

### Coach Model (Enhanced)

```swift
struct CoachProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var title: String           // Head Coach, Assistant Coach, etc.
    var profileImageURL: String?
    var bio: String

    // Professional Details
    var yearsExperience: Int
    var eduEmail: String
    var phone: String?
    var officeLocation: String?

    // Education & Credentials
    var education: [Education]
    var certifications: [Certification]

    // Coaching Philosophy
    var philosophy: String?

    // Career Highlights
    var highlights: [String]
    var awards: [Award]

    // Association
    var programId: String       // Links to Program Profile
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String
    var sport: String

    // Social & Contact
    var socialLinks: SocialLinks

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isVerified: Bool

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct Education: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var degree: String          // B.S., M.S., Ph.D., etc.
    var field: String           // Exercise Science, etc.
    var institution: String
    var graduationYear: Int
}

struct Certification: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String            // AVCA Certified, etc.
    var issuingOrganization: String
    var issueDate: Date
    var expirationDate: Date?
}

struct Award: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct SocialLinks: Codable {
    var twitter: String?
    var instagram: String?
    var linkedin: String?
    var personalWebsite: String?
}
```

### Program Profile Model

```swift
struct ProgramProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var programName: String     // "University of Texas Volleyball"
    var sport: String
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String

    // Branding
    var logoURL: String?
    var heroImageURL: String?
    var primaryColor: String    // Hex color
    var secondaryColor: String  // Hex color

    // Program Details
    var division: String        // NCAA Division I
    var conference: String      // Big 12
    var founded: Int?
    var overview: String

    // Team Culture
    var cultureValues: [String] // ["Excellence", "Teamwork", "Integrity"]
    var cultureDescription: String

    // Achievements
    var conferenceChampionships: Int
    var nationalChampionships: Int
    var currentRanking: Int?
    var recentAchievements: [Achievement]

    // Academic
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicSupport: AcademicSupport

    // Recruiting
    var recruitingPriorities: [RecruitingPriority]

    // Roster
    var roster: [PlayerProfile]

    // Facilities
    var facilities: [Facility]

    // Coaching Staff
    var coachingStaff: [CoachReference]

    // Schedule & Results
    var currentSeasonRecord: SeasonRecord?
    var recentMatches: [MatchResult]

    // Alumni
    var featuredAlumni: [AlumniProfile]

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isPublished: Bool
}

struct Achievement: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var icon: String            // SF Symbol name
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct AcademicSupport: Codable {
    var description: String
    var resources: [String]     // ["Study halls", "Tutoring", etc.]
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicAllAmericans: Int?
}

struct RecruitingPriority: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var graduatingClass: String // "Class of 2025"
    var positions: [PositionNeed]
}

struct PositionNeed: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var position: String        // "Middle Blocker"
    var isPriority: Bool
    var quantity: Int           // Number of recruits needed
    var description: String?
}

struct PlayerProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var jerseyNumber: Int
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var position: String
    var classYear: String       // "Freshman", "Sophomore", etc.
    var height: String          // "6'1\""
    var hometown: String
    var highSchool: String?
    var photoURL: String?
    var starRating: Int?        // 1-5 stars
    var stats: PlayerStats?

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct PlayerStats: Codable {
    var kills: Int?
    var blocks: Int?
    var aces: Int?
    var digs: Int?
    var assists: Int?
    // Sport-specific stats can be added
}

struct Facility: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var type: FacilityType
    var description: String
    var features: [String]
    var imageURLs: [String]
    var capacity: Int?
    var openedYear: Int?
    var renovatedYear: Int?
}

enum FacilityType: String, Codable {
    case arena = "Arena"
    case trainingCenter = "Training Center"
    case academic = "Academic Facility"
    case lockerRoom = "Locker Room"
    case sportsMedicine = "Sports Medicine"
    case other = "Other"
}

struct CoachReference: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var coachProfileId: String  // Links to CoachProfile
    var name: String
    var title: String
    var photoURL: String?
    var yearsExperience: Int?
}

struct SeasonRecord: Codable {
    var season: String          // "2024"
    var wins: Int
    var losses: Int
    var conferenceWins: Int
    var conferenceLosses: Int
}

struct MatchResult: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var date: Date
    var opponent: String
    var isHome: Bool
    var result: MatchResultType
    var score: String           // "3-1", "3-0", etc.
}

enum MatchResultType: String, Codable {
    case win = "W"
    case loss = "L"
}

struct AlumniProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var graduationYear: Int
    var currentRole: String     // "Professional Player", "Coach", etc.
    var description: String
    var photoURL: String?
}
```

---

## SwiftUI Implementation Guide

```
Models/

Services/
```

### Example View Implementation

#### ProfileHubView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct ProfileHubView: View {
    @StateObject private var viewModel = ProfileHubViewModel()
    @State private var navigateToCoachProfile = false
    @State private var navigateToProgramProfile = false

    var body: some View {
        NavigationStack {
            ZStack {
                // Background gradient
                LinearGradient(
                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [
                        Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
                        Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
                    ]),
                    startPoint: .topLeading,
                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
                )
                .ignoresSafeArea()

                ScrollView {
                    VStack(spacing: 24) {
                        // Header Section
                        headerSection
                            .padding(.top, 20)

                        // Profile Type Cards
                        VStack(spacing: 16) {
                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "person.fill",
                                title: "Personal Profile",
                                description: "View and manage your coaching credentials",
                                iconColor: .blue
                            ) {
                                navigateToCoachProfile = true
                            }

                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "building.2.fill",
                                title: "\(viewModel.programName) Program",
                                description: "Manage your team's recruiting presence",
                                iconColor: .orange
                            ) {
                                navigateToProgramProfile = true
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        // Recent Activity
                        activitySection
                            .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        Spacer(minLength: 40)
                    }
                }
            }
            .navigationTitle("Profile Hub")
            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.large)
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToCoachProfile) {
                CoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.coachViewModel)
            }
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToProgramProfile) {
                ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)
            }
        }
    }

    private var headerSection: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 12) {
            // Profile Photo
            AsyncImage(url: URL(string: viewModel.profileImageURL)) { image in
                image
                    .resizable()
                    .aspectRatio(contentMode: .fill)
            } placeholder: {
                Image(systemName: "person.circle.fill")
                    .resizable()
                    .foregroundColor(.gray)
            }
            .frame(width: 120, height: 120)
            .clipShape(Circle())
            .overlay(
                Circle()
                    .stroke(Color.white, lineWidth: 4)
            )
            .shadow(radius: 10)

            // Name and Title
            Text(viewModel.coachName)
                .font(.title2)
                .fontWeight(.bold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            Text(viewModel.title)
                .font(.subheadline)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.9))

            Text(viewModel.schoolName)
                .font(.footnote)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.7))
        }
    }

    private var activitySection: some View {
        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
            Text("Recent Activity")
                .font(.title3)
                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(viewModel.recentActivity) { activity in
                    ActivityRowView(activity: activity)
                }
            }
            .padding(16)
            .background(
                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                    .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.3))
                    .overlay(
                        RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.2), lineWidth: 1)
                    )
            )
        }
    }
}
```

#### CoachProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct CoachProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: CoachProfileViewModel
    @State private var showingEditView = false
    @State private var expandedSections: Set<String> = []

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Section
                CoachHeroSection(
                    profileImageURL: viewModel.profileImageURL,
                    name: viewModel.fullName,
                    title: viewModel.title,
                    schoolName: viewModel.schoolName,
                    programColors: viewModel.programColors,
                    onMessage: { viewModel.initiateMessage() },
                    onConnect: { viewModel.connect() }
                )

                // Stats Bar
                StatsBarView(
                    stats: [
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.yearsExperience)", label: "Years Experience"),
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.titlesWon)", label: "Titles Won"),
                        Stat(value: viewModel.division, label: "Division")
                    ]
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)  // Overlap with hero

                // Content Sections
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    // About Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "About",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("about")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("about")
                    } content: {
                        Text(viewModel.bio)
                            .font(.body)
                            .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Credentials Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Credentials & Education",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("credentials")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("credentials")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.education) { edu in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "graduationcap.fill",
                                    title: "\(edu.degree) \(edu.field)",
                                    subtitle: edu.institution,
                                    iconColor: .blue
                                )
                            }

                            ForEach(viewModel.certifications) { cert in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "seal.fill",
                                    title: cert.name,
                                    subtitle: cert.issuingOrganization,
                                    iconColor: .green
                                )
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Philosophy Section
                    if let philosophy = viewModel.philosophy {
                        ExpandableSection(
                            title: "Coaching Philosophy",
                            isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("philosophy")
                        ) {
                            toggleSection("philosophy")
                        } content: {
                            Text(philosophy)
                                .font(.body)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                .padding(20)
                        }
                    }

                    // Career Highlights
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Career Highlights",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("highlights")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("highlights")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.highlights, id: \.self) { highlight in
                                HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 8) {
                                    Text("")
                                        .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                    Text(highlight)
                                        .font(.body)
                                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Associated Program Link
                    NavigationLink(destination: ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)) {
                        HStack {
                            Image(systemName: "building.2.fill")
                                .foregroundColor(.orange)

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                                Text("Associated Program")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                                Text(viewModel.programName)
                                    .font(.body)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            }

                            Spacer()

                            Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
                        .cornerRadius(12)
                    }

                    // Contact Information
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Contact Information",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("contact")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("contact")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(spacing: 12) {
                            ContactRow(icon: "envelope.fill", value: viewModel.email)
                            if let phone = viewModel.phone {
                                ContactRow(icon: "phone.fill", value: phone)
                            }
                            if let office = viewModel.officeLocation {
                                ContactRow(icon: "building.fill", value: office)
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Coach Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.isOwnProfile {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditCoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private func toggleSection(_ section: String) {
        withAnimation(.spring()) {
            if expandedSections.contains(section) {
                expandedSections.remove(section)
            } else {
                expandedSections.insert(section)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

#### ProgramProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

enum ProgramTab: String, CaseIterable {
    case overview = "Overview"
    case roster = "Roster"
    case facilities = "Facilities"
}

struct ProgramProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: ProgramProfileViewModel
    @State private var selectedTab: ProgramTab = .overview
    @State private var showingEditView = false

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Banner
                ProgramHeroSection(
                    heroImageURL: viewModel.heroImageURL,
                    logoURL: viewModel.logoURL,
                    programName: viewModel.programName,
                    conference: viewModel.conference,
                    division: viewModel.division,
                    gradientColors: viewModel.gradientColors
                )

                // Quick Stats
                QuickStatsView(
                    founded: viewModel.founded,
                    conferenceTitles: viewModel.conferenceChampionships,
                    nationalRanking: viewModel.currentRanking
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)

                // Tab Navigation
                TabBarView(selectedTab: $selectedTab)
                    .padding(.top, 20)

                // Tab Content
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    switch selectedTab {
                    case .overview:
                        overviewContent
                    case .roster:
                        rosterContent
                    case .facilities:
                        facilitiesContent
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Program Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.canEdit {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private var overviewContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Program Overview
            ContentSection(title: "Program Overview") {
                Text(viewModel.overview)
                    .font(.body)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
            }

            // Recent Achievements
            ContentSection(title: "Recent Achievements") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recentAchievements) { achievement in
                        AchievementBadge(
                            icon: achievement.icon,
                            title: achievement.title,
                            subtitle: String(achievement.year)
                        )
                    }
                }
            }

            // Culture & Values
            ContentSection(title: "Program Culture & Values") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    HStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(viewModel.cultureValues, id: \.self) { value in
                            Text(value)
                                .font(.caption)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                .padding(.horizontal, 12)
                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
                                .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                                .cornerRadius(16)
                        }
                    }

                    Text(viewModel.cultureDescription)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                }
            }

            // Recruiting Priorities
            ContentSection(title: "Recruiting Priorities") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recruitingPriorities) { priority in
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
                            Text(priority.graduatingClass)
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)

                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
                                ForEach(priority.positions) { position in
                                    RecruitingPriorityCard(
                                        position: position.position,
                                        isPriority: position.isPriority
                                    )
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // Academic Support
            ContentSection(title: "Academic Support") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text(viewModel.academicSupport.description)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    if let gpa = viewModel.academicSupport.teamGPA,
                       let gradRate = viewModel.academicSupport.graduationRate {
                        HStack(spacing: 20) {
                            StatsPill(
                                value: String(format: "%.1f", gpa),
                                label: "Team GPA"
                            )
                            StatsPill(
                                value: "\(Int(gradRate))%",
                                label: "Grad Rate"
                            )
                        }
                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
                    }
                }
            }

            // Coaching Staff
            ContentSection(title: "Coaching Staff") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.coachingStaff) { coach in
                        NavigationLink(destination: CoachProfileDetailView(coachId: coach.id)) {
                            CoachStaffRow(coach: coach)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var rosterContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Filter Options
            HStack(spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(["All", "Seniors", "Juniors", "Sophomores", "Freshmen"], id: \.self) { filter in
                    FilterChip(title: filter, isSelected: viewModel.selectedFilter == filter) {
                        viewModel.selectedFilter = filter
                    }
                }
            }

            // Roster by Class
            ForEach(viewModel.rosterByClass, id: \.classYear) { section in
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text("\(section.classYear) (\(section.players.count))")
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    VStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(section.players) { player in
                            PlayerCardView(player: player)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var facilitiesContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            ForEach(viewModel.facilities) { facility in
                FacilityCardView(facility: facility)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

---

## View Modes

### Edit Mode vs View Mode

#### Edit Mode Features

**Personal Coach Profile Edit Mode:**
- Inline editing of all text fields
- Photo upload capabilities
- Add/remove credentials
- Reorder highlights
- Preview toggle
- Save/Cancel buttons in toolbar

**Program Profile Edit Mode:**
- Multi-section edit interface
- Bulk roster import
- Facility photo management
- Recruiting priority editor
- Color theme customization
- Draft/Publish status

#### View Mode Context

**Coach Viewing Own Profile:**
- Edit button visible
- Analytics visible (views, engagement)
- Privacy settings accessible
- Quick actions prominent

**Athlete Viewing Coach Profile:**
- Contact buttons prominent
- Social proof emphasized
- Related programs suggested
- Save/bookmark option
- Share functionality

**Athlete Viewing Program Profile:**
- Contact coaching staff prominent
- Application/interest form
- Comparison tools
- Similar programs suggested
- Virtual tour access

---

## Accessibility Considerations

### WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance

#### Color Contrast
- All text maintains 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
- Large text (>18pt) maintains 3:1 ratio
- Interactive elements have clear focus states
- Program colors validated for accessibility

#### Navigation
- Clear heading hierarchy (H1  H6)
- Skip navigation links
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Keyboard navigation support

#### Screen Reader Support
- Semantic HTML/SwiftUI elements
- ARIA labels on custom components
- Alt text for all images
- Descriptive link text

#### Interactive Elements
- Minimum tap target: 44x44pt
- Clear focus indicators
- Error messages clearly associated
- Form validation feedback

#### Motion & Animation
- Respect reduced motion settings
- No auto-playing videos
- Pause/stop controls for carousels
- Animation duration < 5 seconds

### VoiceOver Optimization

```swift
// Example VoiceOver implementation
Image(systemName: "envelope.fill")
    .accessibilityLabel("Email")
    .accessibilityHint("Contact coach via email")

Button(action: { /* action */ }) {
    Text("View Program")
}
.accessibilityLabel("View University of Texas Volleyball Program")
.accessibilityHint("Navigates to program profile")
```

---

## Implementation Checklist

### Phase 1: Core Structure
- [ ] Data models created
- [ ] View model architecture established
- [ ] Profile Hub view implemented
- [ ] Navigation flow working
- [ ] Basic styling applied

### Phase 2: Personal Profile
- [ ] Coach profile view complete
- [ ] Edit mode implemented
- [ ] Credentials section working
- [ ] Contact information functional
- [ ] Photo upload working

### Phase 3: Program Profile
- [ ] Program overview complete
- [ ] Roster management working
- [ ] Facilities section implemented
- [ ] Tab navigation functional
- [ ] Edit mode complete

### Phase 4: Integration
- [ ] API service integration
- [ ] Image upload/storage
- [ ] Real-time updates
- [ ] Search integration
- [ ] Analytics tracking

### Phase 5: Polish
- [ ] Accessibility audit
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Error handling
- [ ] Loading states
- [ ] Empty states
- [ ] Offline support

---

## Future Enhancements

### Version 2.0 Features
1. **Video Integration**: Coach introduction videos, facility tours
2. **Interactive Timeline**: Career progression visualization
3. **Recruit Messaging**: Built-in communication tools
4. **Calendar Integration**: Schedule visits, camps
5. **Analytics Dashboard**: Profile performance metrics
6. **Virtual Tours**: 3D facility exploration
7. **Comparison Tools**: Side-by-side program comparison
8. **Scholarship Calculator**: Financial aid estimation
9. **Application Tracking**: Recruit interest pipeline
10. **Social Feed**: Program updates and news

### Advanced Features
- AI-powered recruit matching
- Video analysis integration
- Parent portal access
- Multi-language support
- Export to PDF/print
- QR code sharing
- NFC business card integration

---

## Conclusion

This design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.

**Key Success Metrics:**
- Profile completion rate > 85%
- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
- Message conversion rate > 15%
- Mobile performance score > 90

**Design Principles Summary:**
1. Clear information hierarchy
2. Mobile-first responsive design
3. Accessibility as core feature
4. Performance optimization
5. Consistent user experience
6. Scalable component system

---

## Appendix

### Related Files
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/Coach.swift` - Existing coach model
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/School.swift` - School model reference
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Profile/ProfileView.swift` - Athlete profile pattern
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Auth/CollegeCoachProfileSetupView.swift` - Onboarding flow

### Design Resources
- SF Symbols catalog: https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols/
- Human Interface Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/
- WCAG 2.1 Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/

### Contact
For questions or clarifications about this design system, consult the ATHLEAD design team or reference the existing profile implementations in the codebase.

---

1# College Coach Profile System - UI/UX Design Document
     2## ATHLEAD Recruiting Platform
     3
     4---
     5
     6## Executive Summary
     7
     8This document outlines the comprehensive UI/UX design for a dual-profile system for college coaches in the ATHLEAD recruiting platform. The system enables coaches to manage both a personal coaching profile and a sport-specific program profile, providing athletes with detailed information about both the coach and the athletic program they represent.
     9
    10---
    11
    12## Table of Contents
    13
    141. [Design Philosophy](#design-philosophy)
    152. [User Flows](#user-flows)
    163. [Profile Architecture](#profile-architecture)
    174. [Personal Coach Profile](#personal-coach-profile)
    185. [Program Profile](#program-profile)
    196. [Navigation Patterns](#navigation-patterns)
    207. [Component Specifications](#component-specifications)
    218. [Data Models](#data-models)
    229. [SwiftUI Implementation Guide](#swiftui-implementation-guide)
    2310. [View Modes](#view-modes)
    2411. [Accessibility Considerations](#accessibility-considerations)
    25
    26---
    27
    28## Design Philosophy
    29
    30### Core Principles
    31
    321. **Dual Identity**: Clear separation between coach as individual and program as entity
    332. **Contextual Switching**: Seamless navigation between personal and program profiles
    343. **Recruiter-Athlete Focus**: Information architecture optimized for recruiting conversations
    354. **Visual Hierarchy**: Sport-specific branding while maintaining platform consistency
    365. **Transparency**: Comprehensive program information to build trust with recruits
    37
    38### Design Language
    39
    40- **Platform**: iOS-native SwiftUI implementation
    41- **Visual Style**: Professional recruiting aesthetic with athletic program branding
    42- **Color System**: Platform primary colors + program-specific accent colors
    43- **Typography**: SF Pro for system text, emphasis on hierarchy
    44- **Spacing**: Consistent 8px grid system (matching existing ATHLEAD design)
    45
    46---
    47
    48## User Flows
    49
    50### Primary User Journey
    51
    52```
    53Coach Login
    54    |
    55    v
    56Profile Hub (Landing)
    57    |
    58    +---> Personal Coach Profile
    59    |         |
    60    |         +---> Edit Personal Info
    61    |         +---> View as Athlete Sees
    62    |         +---> Credentials & Bio
    63    |
    64    +---> Program Profile
    65              |
    66              +---> Edit Program Info
    67              +---> Manage Roster
    68              +---> Update Facilities
    69              +---> Post Achievements
    70              +---> View as Athlete Sees
    71```
    72
    73### Athlete Viewing Journey
    74
    75```
    76Athlete Search/Browse
    77    |
    78    v
    79Coach Discovery
    80    |
    81    +---> Coach Personal Profile
    82    |         |
    83    |         +---> View Credentials
    84    |         +---> Message Coach
    85    |         +---> See Associated Program
    86    |
    87    +---> Program Profile
    88              |
    89              +---> Explore Team Culture
    90              +---> View Facilities
    91              +---> See Current Roster
    92              +---> Check Academic Resources
    93              +---> Contact Coaching Staff
    94```
    95
    96---
    97
    98## Profile Architecture
    99
   100### Profile Hub Landing
   101
   102The Profile Hub serves as the central navigation point for coaches to manage both profiles.
   103
   104#### Layout Structure
   105
   106```
   107
   108   [Back]      Profile Hub      []  <- Navigation Bar
   109
   110                                       
   111     
   112      Coach Profile Photo            <- Header Section

   114      Head Coach - Volleyball      
   115      University of Texas

   121     coaching credentials           
   122                         []

   124

   133    5 new athlete views today        
   134    2 messages from prospects

   138```
   139
   140#### Component Breakdown
   141
   142**Header Section**
   143- Circular profile photo (120pt diameter)
   144- Coach name (Title2, Bold)
   145- Position and sport (Subheadline, Secondary color)
   146- Institution name (Footnote, Tertiary color)
   147- Semi-transparent card background with blur effect
   148
   149**Profile Type Cards**
   150- Full-width cards with subtle border
   151- Icon + Title + Description layout
   152- Chevron right indicator
   153- Tap target: entire card
   154- Background: `.systemGray6` with corner radius 16pt
   155- Padding: 20pt all sides
   156- Spacing between cards: 16pt
   157
   158---

   275#### Content Sections
   276All sections follow consistent pattern:

   282  - Color: `.systemBackground`

   287- **Content Spacing**: 12pt between items

   519
   520## Navigation Patterns
   521
   522### Profile Switching
   523
   524**Method 1: Profile Hub (Recommended)**
   525- Central hub accessed from Profile tab
   526- Visual cards for each profile type
   527- Clear separation of contexts
   528
   529**Method 2: Segmented Control**
   530```
   531
   532    
   533    Personal    Program Profile   
   534    
   535
   536  [Profile content based on selection] 
   537
   538```
   539
   540**Method 3: Contextual Linking**
   541- Cross-link between profiles
   542- "View Associated Program" button on personal profile
   543- "Meet the Coaching Staff" on program profile
   544
   545### Navigation Hierarchy
   546
   547```
   548Main Tab Bar
   549 Feed
   550 Search
   551 AI Assistant
   552 Messages
   553 Profile (College Coach)
   554     Profile Hub (Landing)
   555        Personal Coach Profile
   556           Edit Personal Info
   557           View as Athlete
   558           Settings
   559       
   560        Program Profile
   561            Edit Program Info
   562            Manage Roster
   563            Update Facilities
   564            Post Updates
   565            View as Athlete
   566    
   567     Settings
   568```
   569
   570### Transitions
   571
   572**Profile Hub to Profile**
   573- Push navigation (slide from right)
   574- Maintains navigation stack
   575- Back button returns to hub
   576
   577**Between Personal and Program**
   578- Cross-fade transition
   579- Maintains scroll position preference
   580- Smooth visual continuity
   581
   582**Edit Mode**
   583- Modal presentation (sheet)
   584- Full-screen on iPhone
   585- Card style on iPad
   586- Dismiss gesture enabled
   587
   588---

   590## Component Specifications
   591
   592### Design System Components
   593
   594#### Color Palette

   597// Base Platform Colors

   673
   674### Reusable Components
   675
   676#### Profile Card Component
   677
   678```swift
   679struct ProfileCard: View {
   680    let title: String
   681    let icon: String
   682    let description: String
   683    let action: () -> Void
   684
   685    var body: some View {
   686        Button(action: action) {
   687            HStack(spacing: 16) {
   688                Image(systemName: icon)
   689                    .font(.system(size: 24))
   690                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
   691                    .frame(width: 50, height: 50)
   692                    .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
   693                    .clipShape(Circle())
   694
   695                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
   696                    Text(title)
   697                        .font(.headline)
   698                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
   699
   700                    Text(description)
   701                        .font(.subheadline)
   702                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
   703                        .lineLimit(2)
   704                }
   705
   706                Spacer()
   707
   708                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
   709                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
   710            }
   711            .padding(20)
   712            .background(Color(.systemGray6))
   713            .cornerRadius(16)
   714        }
   715        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
   716    }
   717}
   718```

   880### Coach Model (Enhanced)
   881
   882```swift
   883struct CoachProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
   884    let id: String
   885
   886    // Basic Information
   887    var firstName: String
   888    var lastName: String
   889    var title: String           // Head Coach, Assistant Coach, etc.
   890    var profileImageURL: String?
   891    var bio: String
   892
   893    // Professional Details
   894    var yearsExperience: Int
   895    var eduEmail: String
   896    var phone: String?
   897    var officeLocation: String?
   898
   899    // Education & Credentials
   900    var education: [Education]
   901    var certifications: [Certification]
   902
   903    // Coaching Philosophy
   904    var philosophy: String?
   905
   906    // Career Highlights
   907    var highlights: [String]
   908    var awards: [Award]
   909
   910    // Association
   911    var programId: String       // Links to Program Profile
   912    var schoolId: String
   913    var schoolName: String
   914    var sport: String
   915
   916    // Social & Contact
   917    var socialLinks: SocialLinks
   918
   919    // Metadata
   920    var createdAt: Date
   921    var updatedAt: Date
   922    var isVerified: Bool
   923
   924    var fullName: String {
   925        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
   926    }
   927}
   928
   929struct Education: Identifiable, Codable {
   930    let id: String
   931    var degree: String          // B.S., M.S., Ph.D., etc.
   932    var field: String           // Exercise Science, etc.
   933    var institution: String
   934    var graduationYear: Int
   935}
   936
   937struct Certification: Identifiable, Codable {
   938    let id: String
   939    var name: String            // AVCA Certified, etc.
   940    var issuingOrganization: String
   941    var issueDate: Date
   942    var expirationDate: Date?
   943}
   944
   945struct Award: Identifiable, Codable {
   946    let id: String
   947    var title: String
   948    var year: Int
   949    var description: String?
   950}
   951
   952struct SocialLinks: Codable {
   953    var twitter: String?
   954    var instagram: String?
   955    var linkedin: String?
   956    var personalWebsite: String?
   957}
   958```

   960### Program Profile Model
   961
   962```swift
   963struct ProgramProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
   964    let id: String
   965
   966    // Basic Information
   967    var programName: String     // "University of Texas Volleyball"
   968    var sport: String
   969    var schoolId: String
   970    var schoolName: String
   971
   972    // Branding
   973    var logoURL: String?
   974    var heroImageURL: String?
   975    var primaryColor: String    // Hex color
   976    var secondaryColor: String  // Hex color
   977
   978    // Program Details
   979    var division: String        // NCAA Division I
   980    var conference: String      // Big 12
   981    var founded: Int?
   982    var overview: String
   983
   984    // Team Culture
   985    var cultureValues: [String] // ["Excellence", "Teamwork", "Integrity"]
   986    var cultureDescription: String
   987
   988    // Achievements
   989    var conferenceChampionships: Int
   990    var nationalChampionships: Int
   991    var currentRanking: Int?
   992    var recentAchievements: [Achievement]
   993
   994    // Academic
   995    var teamGPA: Double?
   996    var graduationRate: Double?
   997    var academicSupport: AcademicSupport
   998
   999    // Recruiting
  1000    var recruitingPriorities: [RecruitingPriority]
  1001
  1002    // Roster
  1003    var roster: [PlayerProfile]
  1004
  1005    // Facilities
  1006    var facilities: [Facility]
  1007
  1008    // Coaching Staff
  1009    var coachingStaff: [CoachReference]
  1010
  1011    // Schedule & Results
  1012    var currentSeasonRecord: SeasonRecord?
  1013    var recentMatches: [MatchResult]
  1014
  1015    // Alumni
  1016    var featuredAlumni: [AlumniProfile]
  1017
  1018    // Metadata
  1019    var createdAt: Date
  1020    var updatedAt: Date
  1021    var isPublished: Bool
  1022}
  1023
  1024struct Achievement: Identifiable, Codable {
  1025    let id: String
  1026    var title: String
  1027    var icon: String            // SF Symbol name
  1028    var year: Int
  1029    var description: String?
  1030}
  1031
  1032struct AcademicSupport: Codable {
  1033    var description: String
  1034    var resources: [String]     // ["Study halls", "Tutoring", etc.]
  1035    var teamGPA: Double?
  1036    var graduationRate: Double?
  1037    var academicAllAmericans: Int?
  1038}
  1039
  1040struct RecruitingPriority: Identifiable, Codable {
  1041    let id: String
  1042    var graduatingClass: String // "Class of 2025"
  1043    var positions: [PositionNeed]
  1044}
  1045
  1046struct PositionNeed: Identifiable, Codable {
  1047    let id: String
  1048    var position: String        // "Middle Blocker"
  1049    var isPriority: Bool
  1050    var quantity: Int           // Number of recruits needed
  1051    var description: String?
  1052}
  1053
  1054struct PlayerProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
  1055    let id: String
  1056    var jerseyNumber: Int
  1057    var firstName: String
  1058    var lastName: String
  1059    var position: String
  1060    var classYear: String       // "Freshman", "Sophomore", etc.
  1061    var height: String          // "6'1\""
  1062    var hometown: String
  1063    var highSchool: String?
  1064    var photoURL: String?
  1065    var starRating: Int?        // 1-5 stars
  1066    var stats: PlayerStats?
  1067
  1068    var fullName: String {
  1069        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
  1070    }
  1071}
  1072
  1073struct PlayerStats: Codable {
  1074    var kills: Int?
  1075    var blocks: Int?
  1076    var aces: Int?
  1077    var digs: Int?
  1078    var assists: Int?
  1079    // Sport-specific stats can be added
  1080}
  1081
  1082struct Facility: Identifiable, Codable {
  1083    let id: String
  1084    var name: String
  1085    var type: FacilityType
  1086    var description: String
  1087    var features: [String]
  1088    var imageURLs: [String]
  1089    var capacity: Int?
  1090    var openedYear: Int?
  1091    var renovatedYear: Int?
  1092}
  1093
  1094enum FacilityType: String, Codable {
  1095    case arena = "Arena"
  1096    case trainingCenter = "Training Center"
  1097    case academic = "Academic Facility"
  1098    case lockerRoom = "Locker Room"
  1099    case sportsMedicine = "Sports Medicine"
  1100    case other = "Other"
  1101}
  1102
  1103struct CoachReference: Identifiable, Codable {
  1104    let id: String
  1105    var coachProfileId: String  // Links to CoachProfile
  1106    var name: String
  1107    var title: String
  1108    var photoURL: String?
  1109    var yearsExperience: Int?
  1110}
  1111
  1112struct SeasonRecord: Codable {
  1113    var season: String          // "2024"
  1114    var wins: Int
  1115    var losses: Int
  1116    var conferenceWins: Int
  1117    var conferenceLosses: Int
  1118}
  1119
  1120struct MatchResult: Identifiable, Codable {
  1121    let id: String
  1122    var date: Date
  1123    var opponent: String
  1124    var isHome: Bool
  1125    var result: MatchResultType
  1126    var score: String           // "3-1", "3-0", etc.
  1127}
  1128
  1129enum MatchResultType: String, Codable {
  1130    case win = "W"
  1131    case loss = "L"
  1132}
  1133
  1134struct AlumniProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
  1135    let id: String
  1136    var name: String
  1137    var graduationYear: Int
  1138    var currentRole: String     // "Professional Player", "Coach", etc.
  1139    var description: String
  1140    var photoURL: String?
  1141}
  1142```

  1194### Example View Implementation

  1196#### ProfileHubView.swift
  1197
  1198```swift
  1199import SwiftUI
  1200
  1201struct ProfileHubView: View {
  1202    @StateObject private var viewModel = ProfileHubViewModel()
  1203    @State private var navigateToCoachProfile = false
  1204    @State private var navigateToProgramProfile = false
  1205
  1206    var body: some View {
  1207        NavigationStack {
  1208            ZStack {
  1209                // Background gradient
  1210                LinearGradient(
  1211                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [
  1212                        Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
  1213                        Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
  1214                    ]),
  1215                    startPoint: .topLeading,
  1216                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
  1217                )
  1218                .ignoresSafeArea()
  1219
  1220                ScrollView {
  1221                    VStack(spacing: 24) {
  1222                        // Header Section
  1223                        headerSection
  1224                            .padding(.top, 20)
  1225
  1226                        // Profile Type Cards
  1227                        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1228                            ProfileTypeCard(
  1229                                icon: "person.fill",
  1230                                title: "Personal Profile",
  1231                                description: "View and manage your coaching credentials",
  1232                                iconColor: .blue
  1233                            ) {
  1234                                navigateToCoachProfile = true
  1235                            }
  1236
  1237                            ProfileTypeCard(
  1238                                icon: "building.2.fill",
  1239                                title: "\(viewModel.programName) Program",
  1240                                description: "Manage your team's recruiting presence",
  1241                                iconColor: .orange
  1242                            ) {
  1243                                navigateToProgramProfile = true
  1244                            }
  1245                        }
  1246                        .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1247
  1248                        // Recent Activity
  1249                        activitySection
  1250                            .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1251
  1252                        Spacer(minLength: 40)
  1253                    }
  1254                }
  1255            }
  1256            .navigationTitle("Profile Hub")
  1257            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.large)
  1258            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToCoachProfile) {
  1259                CoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.coachViewModel)
  1260            }
  1261            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToProgramProfile) {
  1262                ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)
  1263            }
  1264        }
  1265    }
  1266
  1267    private var headerSection: some View {
  1268        VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1269            // Profile Photo
  1270            AsyncImage(url: URL(string: viewModel.profileImageURL)) { image in
  1271                image
  1272                    .resizable()
  1273                    .aspectRatio(contentMode: .fill)
  1274            } placeholder: {
  1275                Image(systemName: "person.circle.fill")
  1276                    .resizable()
  1277                    .foregroundColor(.gray)
  1278            }
  1279            .frame(width: 120, height: 120)
  1280            .clipShape(Circle())
  1281            .overlay(
  1282                Circle()
  1283                    .stroke(Color.white, lineWidth: 4)
  1284            )
  1285            .shadow(radius: 10)
  1286
  1287            // Name and Title
  1288            Text(viewModel.coachName)
  1289                .font(.title2)
  1290                .fontWeight(.bold)
  1291                .foregroundColor(.white)
  1292
  1293            Text(viewModel.title)
  1294                .font(.subheadline)
  1295                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.9))
  1296
  1297            Text(viewModel.schoolName)
  1298                .font(.footnote)
  1299                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.7))
  1300        }
  1301    }
  1302
  1303    private var activitySection: some View {
  1304        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
  1305            Text("Recent Activity")
  1306                .font(.title3)
  1307                .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1308                .foregroundColor(.white)
  1309
  1310            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
  1311                ForEach(viewModel.recentActivity) { activity in
  1312                    ActivityRowView(activity: activity)
  1313                }
  1314            }
  1315            .padding(16)
  1316            .background(
  1317                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
  1318                    .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.3))
  1319                    .overlay(
  1320                        RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
  1321                            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.2), lineWidth: 1)
  1322                    )
  1323            )
  1324        }
  1325    }
  1326}
  1327```

  1332import SwiftUI

  1334struct CoachProfileView: View {
  1335    @ObservedObject var viewModel: CoachProfileViewModel

  1337    @State private var expandedSections: Set<String> = []

  1339    var body: some View {
