  1344                    profileImageURL: viewModel.profileImageURL,
  1345                    name: viewModel.fullName,
  1346                    title: viewModel.title,
  1347                    schoolName: viewModel.schoolName,
  1348                    programColors: viewModel.programColors,
  1349                    onMessage: { viewModel.initiateMessage() },
  1350                    onConnect: { viewModel.connect() }
  1351                )
  1352
  1353                // Stats Bar
  1354                StatsBarView(
  1355                    stats: [
  1356                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.yearsExperience)", label: "Years Experience"),
  1357                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.titlesWon)", label: "Titles Won"),
  1358                        Stat(value: viewModel.division, label: "Division")
  1359                    ]
  1360                )
  1361                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1362                .padding(.top, -30)  // Overlap with hero
  1363
  1364                // Content Sections
  1365                VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1366                    // About Section
  1367                    ExpandableSection(
  1368                        title: "About",
  1369                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("about")
  1370                    ) {
  1371                        toggleSection("about")
  1372                    } content: {
  1373                        Text(viewModel.bio)
  1374                            .font(.body)
  1375                            .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1376                            .padding(20)
  1377                    }
  1378
  1379                    // Credentials Section
  1380                    ExpandableSection(
  1381                        title: "Credentials & Education",
  1382                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("credentials")
  1383                    ) {
  1384                        toggleSection("credentials")
  1385                    } content: {
  1386                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
  1387                            ForEach(viewModel.education) { edu in
  1388                                CredentialRow(
  1389                                    icon: "graduationcap.fill",
  1390                                    title: "\(edu.degree) \(edu.field)",
  1391                                    subtitle: edu.institution,
  1392                                    iconColor: .blue
  1393                                )
  1394                            }
  1395
  1396                            ForEach(viewModel.certifications) { cert in
  1397                                CredentialRow(
  1398                                    icon: "seal.fill",
  1399                                    title: cert.name,
  1400                                    subtitle: cert.issuingOrganization,
  1401                                    iconColor: .green
  1402                                )
  1403                            }
  1404                        }
  1405                        .padding(20)
  1406                    }
  1407
  1408                    // Philosophy Section
  1409                    if let philosophy = viewModel.philosophy {
  1410                        ExpandableSection(
  1411                            title: "Coaching Philosophy",
  1412                            isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("philosophy")
  1413                        ) {
  1414                            toggleSection("philosophy")
  1415                        } content: {
  1416                            Text(philosophy)
  1417                                .font(.body)
  1418                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1419                                .padding(20)
  1420                        }
  1421                    }
  1422
  1423                    // Career Highlights
  1424                    ExpandableSection(
  1425                        title: "Career Highlights",
  1426                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("highlights")
  1427                    ) {
  1428                        toggleSection("highlights")
  1429                    } content: {
  1430                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
  1431                            ForEach(viewModel.highlights, id: \.self) { highlight in
  1432                                HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 8) {
  1433                                    Text("")
  1434                                        .foregroundColor(.blue)
  1435                                    Text(highlight)
  1436                                        .font(.body)
  1437                                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1438                                }
  1439                            }
  1440                        }
  1441                        .padding(20)
  1442                    }
  1443
  1444                    // Associated Program Link
  1445                    NavigationLink(destination: ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)) {
  1446                        HStack {
  1447                            Image(systemName: "building.2.fill")
  1448                                .foregroundColor(.orange)
  1449
  1450                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
  1451                                Text("Associated Program")
  1452                                    .font(.caption)
  1453                                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
  1454
  1455                                Text(viewModel.programName)
  1456                                    .font(.body)
  1457                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1458                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1459                            }
  1460
  1461                            Spacer()
  1462
  1463                            Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
  1464                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
  1465                        }
  1466                        .padding(20)
  1467                        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
  1468                        .cornerRadius(12)
  1469                    }
  1470
  1471                    // Contact Information
  1472                    ExpandableSection(
  1473                        title: "Contact Information",
  1474                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("contact")
  1475                    ) {
  1476                        toggleSection("contact")
  1477                    } content: {
  1478                        VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1479                            ContactRow(icon: "envelope.fill", value: viewModel.email)
  1480                            if let phone = viewModel.phone {

  1482                            }
  1483                            if let office = viewModel.officeLocation {
  1484                                ContactRow(icon: "building.fill", value: office)
  1485                            }
  1486                        }
  1487                        .padding(20)
  1488                    }
  1489                }
  1490                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1491                .padding(.top, 20)
  1492                .padding(.bottom, 40)
  1493            }
  1494        }
  1495        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
  1496        .navigationTitle("Coach Profile")
  1497        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
  1498        .toolbar {
  1499            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
  1500                if viewModel.isOwnProfile {
  1501                    Button("Edit") {
  1502                        showingEditView = true
  1503                    }
  1504                }
  1505            }
  1506        }
  1507        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
  1508            EditCoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
  1509        }
  1510    }
  1511
  1512    private func toggleSection(_ section: String) {
  1513        withAnimation(.spring()) {
  1514            if expandedSections.contains(section) {
  1515                expandedSections.remove(section)
  1516            } else {
  1517                expandedSections.insert(section)
  1518            }
  1519        }
  1520    }
  1521}
  1522```
  1523
  1524#### ProgramProfileView.swift
  1525
  1526```swift
  1527import SwiftUI
  1528
  1529enum ProgramTab: String, CaseIterable {
  1530    case overview = "Overview"
  1531    case roster = "Roster"
  1532    case facilities = "Facilities"
  1533}
  1534
  1535struct ProgramProfileView: View {
  1536    @ObservedObject var viewModel: ProgramProfileViewModel
  1537    @State private var selectedTab: ProgramTab = .overview
  1538    @State private var showingEditView = false
  1539
  1540    var body: some View {
  1541        ScrollView {
  1542            VStack(spacing: 0) {
  1543                // Hero Banner
  1544                ProgramHeroSection(
  1545                    heroImageURL: viewModel.heroImageURL,
  1546                    logoURL: viewModel.logoURL,
  1547                    programName: viewModel.programName,
  1548                    conference: viewModel.conference,
  1549                    division: viewModel.division,
  1550                    gradientColors: viewModel.gradientColors
  1551                )
  1552
  1553                // Quick Stats
  1554                QuickStatsView(
  1555                    founded: viewModel.founded,
  1556                    conferenceTitles: viewModel.conferenceChampionships,
  1557                    nationalRanking: viewModel.currentRanking
  1558                )
  1559                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1560                .padding(.top, -30)
  1561
  1562                // Tab Navigation
  1563                TabBarView(selectedTab: $selectedTab)
  1564                    .padding(.top, 20)
  1565
  1566                // Tab Content
  1567                VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1568                    switch selectedTab {
  1569                    case .overview:
  1570                        overviewContent
  1571                    case .roster:
  1572                        rosterContent
  1573                    case .facilities:
  1574                        facilitiesContent
  1575                    }
  1576                }
  1577                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
  1578                .padding(.top, 20)
  1579                .padding(.bottom, 40)
  1580            }
  1581        }
  1582        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
  1583        .navigationTitle("Program Profile")
  1584        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
  1585        .toolbar {
  1586            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
  1587                if viewModel.canEdit {
  1588                    Button("Edit") {
  1589                        showingEditView = true
  1590                    }
  1591                }
  1592            }
  1593        }
  1594        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
  1595            EditProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
  1596        }
  1597    }
  1598
  1599    private var overviewContent: some View {
  1600        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1601            // Program Overview
  1602            ContentSection(title: "Program Overview") {
  1603                Text(viewModel.overview)
  1604                    .font(.body)
  1605                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1606            }
  1607
  1608            // Recent Achievements
  1609            ContentSection(title: "Recent Achievements") {
  1610                VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1611                    ForEach(viewModel.recentAchievements) { achievement in
  1612                        AchievementBadge(
  1613                            icon: achievement.icon,
  1614                            title: achievement.title,
  1615                            subtitle: String(achievement.year)
  1616                        )
  1617                    }
  1618                }
  1619            }
  1620
  1621            // Culture & Values
  1622            ContentSection(title: "Program Culture & Values") {
  1623                VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1624                    HStack(spacing: 12) {
  1625                        ForEach(viewModel.cultureValues, id: \.self) { value in
  1626                            Text(value)
  1627                                .font(.caption)
  1628                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1629                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
  1630                                .padding(.horizontal, 12)
  1631                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
  1632                                .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
  1633                                .cornerRadius(16)
  1634                        }
  1635                    }
  1636
  1637                    Text(viewModel.cultureDescription)
  1638                        .font(.body)
  1639                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
  1640                }
  1641            }
  1642
  1643            // Recruiting Priorities
  1644            ContentSection(title: "Recruiting Priorities") {
  1645                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
  1646                    ForEach(viewModel.recruitingPriorities) { priority in
  1647                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
  1648                            Text(priority.graduatingClass)
  1649                                .font(.subheadline)
  1650                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
  1651                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1652
  1653                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
  1654                                ForEach(priority.positions) { position in
  1655                                    RecruitingPriorityCard(
  1656                                        position: position.position,
  1657                                        isPriority: position.isPriority
  1658                                    )
  1659                                }
  1660                            }
  1661                        }
  1662                    }
  1663                }
  1664            }
  1665
  1666            // Academic Support
  1667            ContentSection(title: "Academic Support") {
  1668                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
  1669                    Text(viewModel.academicSupport.description)
  1670                        .font(.body)
  1671                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1672
  1673                    if let gpa = viewModel.academicSupport.teamGPA,
  1674                       let gradRate = viewModel.academicSupport.graduationRate {
  1675                        HStack(spacing: 20) {
  1676                            StatsPill(
  1677                                value: String(format: "%.1f", gpa),
  1678                                label: "Team GPA"
  1679                            )
  1680                            StatsPill(
  1681                                value: "\(Int(gradRate))%",
  1682                                label: "Grad Rate"
  1683                            )
  1684                        }
  1685                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
  1686                    }
  1687                }
  1688            }
  1689
  1690            // Coaching Staff
  1691            ContentSection(title: "Coaching Staff") {
  1692                VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1693                    ForEach(viewModel.coachingStaff) { coach in
  1694                        NavigationLink(destination: CoachProfileDetailView(coachId: coach.id)) {
  1695                            CoachStaffRow(coach: coach)
  1696                        }
  1697                    }
  1698                }
  1699            }
  1700        }
  1701    }
  1702
  1703    private var rosterContent: some View {
  1704        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1705            // Filter Options
  1706            HStack(spacing: 12) {
  1707                ForEach(["All", "Seniors", "Juniors", "Sophomores", "Freshmen"], id: \.self) { filter in
  1708                    FilterChip(title: filter, isSelected: viewModel.selectedFilter == filter) {
  1709                        viewModel.selectedFilter = filter
  1710                    }
  1711                }
  1712            }
  1713
  1714            // Roster by Class
  1715            ForEach(viewModel.rosterByClass, id: \.classYear) { section in
  1716                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
  1717                    Text("\(section.classYear) (\(section.players.count))")
  1718                        .font(.headline)
  1719                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
  1720
  1721                    VStack(spacing: 12) {
  1722                        ForEach(section.players) { player in
  1723                            PlayerCardView(player: player)
  1724                        }
  1725                    }
  1726                }
  1727            }
  1728        }
  1729    }
  1730
  1731    private var facilitiesContent: some View {
  1732        VStack(spacing: 16) {
  1733            ForEach(viewModel.facilities) { facility in
  1734                FacilityCardView(facility: facility)
  1735            }
  1736        }
  1737    }
  1738}
  1739```
  1740
  1741---
  1742
  1743## View Modes
  1744
  1745### Edit Mode vs View Mode
  1746
  1747#### Edit Mode Features
  1748
  1749**Personal Coach Profile Edit Mode:**
  1750- Inline editing of all text fields
  1751- Photo upload capabilities
  1752- Add/remove credentials
  1753- Reorder highlights
  1754- Preview toggle
  1755- Save/Cancel buttons in toolbar
  1756
  1757**Program Profile Edit Mode:**
  1758- Multi-section edit interface
  1759- Bulk roster import
  1760- Facility photo management
  1761- Recruiting priority editor
  1762- Color theme customization
  1763- Draft/Publish status
  1764
  1765#### View Mode Context
  1766
  1767**Coach Viewing Own Profile:**
  1768- Edit button visible
  1769- Analytics visible (views, engagement)
  1770- Privacy settings accessible
  1771- Quick actions prominent
  1772
  1773**Athlete Viewing Coach Profile:**
  1774- Contact buttons prominent
  1775- Social proof emphasized
  1776- Related programs suggested
  1777- Save/bookmark option
  1778- Share functionality
  1779
  1780**Athlete Viewing Program Profile:**
  1781- Contact coaching staff prominent
  1782- Application/interest form
  1783- Comparison tools
  1784- Similar programs suggested
  1785- Virtual tour access
  1786
  1787---
  1788
  1789## Accessibility Considerations
  1790
  1791### WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance
  1792
  1793#### Color Contrast
  1794- All text maintains 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
  1795- Large text (>18pt) maintains 3:1 ratio
  1796- Interactive elements have clear focus states
  1797- Program colors validated for accessibility
  1798
  1799#### Navigation
  1800- Clear heading hierarchy (H1  H6)
  1801- Skip navigation links
  1802- Breadcrumb navigation
  1803- Keyboard navigation support
  1804
  1805#### Screen Reader Support
  1806- Semantic HTML/SwiftUI elements
  1807- ARIA labels on custom components
  1808- Alt text for all images
  1809- Descriptive link text
  1810
  1811#### Interactive Elements
  1812- Minimum tap target: 44x44pt
  1813- Clear focus indicators
  1814- Error messages clearly associated
  1815- Form validation feedback
  1816
  1817#### Motion & Animation
  1818- Respect reduced motion settings
  1819- No auto-playing videos
  1820- Pause/stop controls for carousels
  1821- Animation duration < 5 seconds
  1822
  1823### VoiceOver Optimization
  1824
  1825```swift
  1826// Example VoiceOver implementation
  1827Image(systemName: "envelope.fill")
  1828    .accessibilityLabel("Email")
  1829    .accessibilityHint("Contact coach via email")
  1830
  1831Button(action: { /* action */ }) {
  1832    Text("View Program")
  1833}
  1834.accessibilityLabel("View University of Texas Volleyball Program")
  1835.accessibilityHint("Navigates to program profile")
  1836```
  1837
  1838---
  1839
  1840## Implementation Checklist
  1841
  1842### Phase 1: Core Structure
  1843- [ ] Data models created
  1844- [ ] View model architecture established
  1845- [ ] Profile Hub view implemented
  1846- [ ] Navigation flow working
  1847- [ ] Basic styling applied
  1848
  1849### Phase 2: Personal Profile
  1850- [ ] Coach profile view complete
  1851- [ ] Edit mode implemented
  1852- [ ] Credentials section working
  1853- [ ] Contact information functional
  1854- [ ] Photo upload working
  1855
  1856### Phase 3: Program Profile
  1857- [ ] Program overview complete
  1858- [ ] Roster management working
  1859- [ ] Facilities section implemented
  1860- [ ] Tab navigation functional
  1861- [ ] Edit mode complete
  1862
  1863### Phase 4: Integration
  1864- [ ] API service integration
  1865- [ ] Image upload/storage
  1866- [ ] Real-time updates
  1867- [ ] Search integration
  1868- [ ] Analytics tracking
  1869
  1870### Phase 5: Polish
  1871- [ ] Accessibility audit
  1872- [ ] Performance optimization
  1873- [ ] Error handling
  1874- [ ] Loading states
  1875- [ ] Empty states
  1876- [ ] Offline support
  1877
  1878---
  1879
  1880## Future Enhancements
  1881
  1882### Version 2.0 Features
  18831. **Video Integration**: Coach introduction videos, facility tours
  18842. **Interactive Timeline**: Career progression visualization
  18853. **Recruit Messaging**: Built-in communication tools
  18864. **Calendar Integration**: Schedule visits, camps
  18875. **Analytics Dashboard**: Profile performance metrics
  18886. **Virtual Tours**: 3D facility exploration
  18897. **Comparison Tools**: Side-by-side program comparison
  18908. **Scholarship Calculator**: Financial aid estimation
  18919. **Application Tracking**: Recruit interest pipeline
  189210. **Social Feed**: Program updates and news
  1893
  1894### Advanced Features
  1895- AI-powered recruit matching
  1896- Video analysis integration
  1897- Parent portal access
  1898- Multi-language support
  1899- Export to PDF/print
  1900- QR code sharing
  1901- NFC business card integration
  1902
  1903---
  1904
  1905## Conclusion
  1906
  1907This design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.
  1908
  1909**Key Success Metrics:**
  1910- Profile completion rate > 85%
  1911- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
  1912- Message conversion rate > 15%
  1913- Mobile performance score > 90
  1914
  1915**Design Principles Summary:**
  19161. Clear information hierarchy
  19172. Mobile-first responsive design
  19183. Accessibility as core feature
  19194. Performance optimization
  19205. Consistent user experience
  19216. Scalable component system
  1922
  1923---
  1924
  1925## Appendix
  1926
  1927### Related Files
  1928- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/Coach.swift` - Existing coach model
  1929- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/School.swift` - School model reference
  1930- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Profile/ProfileView.swift` - Athlete profile pattern

  1934- SF Symbols catalog: https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols/
  1935- Human Interface Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/
  1936- WCAG 2.1 Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/
  1937
  1938### Contact
  1939For questions or clarifications about this design system, consult the ATHLEAD design team or reference the existing profile implementations in the codebase.
  1940
  1941---
  1942

file.content:
# College Coach Profile System - UI/UX Design Document
## ATHLEAD Recruiting Platform

---

## Executive Summary

This document outlines the comprehensive UI/UX design for a dual-profile system for college coaches in the ATHLEAD recruiting platform. The system enables coaches to manage both a personal coaching profile and a sport-specific program profile, providing athletes with detailed information about both the coach and the athletic program they represent.

---

## Table of Contents

1. [Design Philosophy](#design-philosophy)
2. [User Flows](#user-flows)
3. [Profile Architecture](#profile-architecture)
4. [Personal Coach Profile](#personal-coach-profile)
5. [Program Profile](#program-profile)
6. [Navigation Patterns](#navigation-patterns)
7. [Component Specifications](#component-specifications)
8. [Data Models](#data-models)
9. [SwiftUI Implementation Guide](#swiftui-implementation-guide)
10. [View Modes](#view-modes)
11. [Accessibility Considerations](#accessibility-considerations)

---

## Design Philosophy

### Core Principles

1. **Dual Identity**: Clear separation between coach as individual and program as entity
2. **Contextual Switching**: Seamless navigation between personal and program profiles
3. **Recruiter-Athlete Focus**: Information architecture optimized for recruiting conversations
4. **Visual Hierarchy**: Sport-specific branding while maintaining platform consistency
5. **Transparency**: Comprehensive program information to build trust with recruits

### Design Language

- **Platform**: iOS-native SwiftUI implementation
- **Visual Style**: Professional recruiting aesthetic with athletic program branding
- **Color System**: Platform primary colors + program-specific accent colors
- **Typography**: SF Pro for system text, emphasis on hierarchy
- **Spacing**: Consistent 8px grid system (matching existing ATHLEAD design)

---

## User Flows

### Primary User Journey

```
Coach Login
    |
    v
Profile Hub (Landing)
    |
    +---> Personal Coach Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> Edit Personal Info
    |         +---> View as Athlete Sees
    |         +---> Credentials & Bio
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Edit Program Info
              +---> Manage Roster
              +---> Update Facilities
              +---> Post Achievements
              +---> View as Athlete Sees
```

### Athlete Viewing Journey

```
Athlete Search/Browse
    |
    v
Coach Discovery
    |
    +---> Coach Personal Profile
    |         |
    |         +---> View Credentials
    |         +---> Message Coach
    |         +---> See Associated Program
    |
    +---> Program Profile
              |
              +---> Explore Team Culture
              +---> View Facilities
              +---> See Current Roster
              +---> Check Academic Resources
              +---> Contact Coaching Staff
```

---

## Profile Architecture

### Profile Hub Landing

The Profile Hub serves as the central navigation point for coaches to manage both profiles.

#### Layout Structure

```

   [Back]      Profile Hub      []  <- Navigation Bar

                                       
     
      Coach Profile Photo            <- Header Section
      Dr. Sarah Johnson            
      Head Coach - Volleyball      
      University of Texas          
     
                                       
      
       Personal Profile            <- Quick Action Cards
     View and manage your           
     coaching credentials           
                         []        
      
                                       
      
       UT Volleyball Program      
     Manage your team's             
     recruiting presence            
                         []        
      
                                       
   Recent Activity                     <- Activity Feed
    5 new athlete views today        
    2 messages from prospects        
    Program profile updated          
                                       

```

#### Component Breakdown

**Header Section**
- Circular profile photo (120pt diameter)
- Coach name (Title2, Bold)
- Position and sport (Subheadline, Secondary color)
- Institution name (Footnote, Tertiary color)
- Semi-transparent card background with blur effect

**Profile Type Cards**
- Full-width cards with subtle border
- Icon + Title + Description layout
- Chevron right indicator
- Tap target: entire card
- Background: `.systemGray6` with corner radius 16pt
- Padding: 20pt all sides
- Spacing between cards: 16pt

---

## Personal Coach Profile

### Purpose
The personal coach profile showcases the individual's credentials, experience, and professional identity.

### Layout Design

```

  []   Coach Profile         [Edit]   <- Navigation

                                       
    <- Hero Section
     [Background: Program Colors]       (Gradient overlay)
                                      
                     
       Profile                     
       Photo                       
                     
                                      
     Dr. Sarah Johnson               
     Head Volleyball Coach           
     University of Texas             
      [Message]  [Connect]       
   
                                       
    <- Stats Bar
    15 Years    3 Titles   NCAA I  
    Experience  Won        Division 
   
                                       
   About                              <- Sections
      (Expandable)
   Passionate volleyball coach with  
   15+ years experience developing   
   championship programs...          
   
                                       
   Credentials & Education           
   
    M.S. Exercise Science          
      University of Michigan         
                                      
    AVCA Certified                 
      Advanced Coaching License      
                                      
    CAA Level 3 Certification      
   
                                       
   Coaching Philosophy               
   
   My coaching philosophy centers    
   on developing the whole athlete.. 
   
                                       
   Career Highlights                 
   
    2022 Big 12 Coach of Year       
    3x Conference Championships     
    15 All-Americans Coached        
    98% Graduation Rate             
   
                                       
   Associated Program                
   
     UT Volleyball Program         
    View full program profile  []   
   
                                       
   Contact Information               
   
    s.johnson@athletics.utexas.edu 
    (512) 555-0100                 
    Anna Hiss Gymnasium            
   
                                       

```

### Section Specifications

#### Hero Section
- **Height**: 350pt
- **Background**: Program-branded gradient (customizable)
- **Profile Photo**:
  - Size: 120pt diameter
  - Border: 4pt white stroke
  - Shadow: subtle drop shadow
  - Position: Center, 100pt from top
- **Name Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Display, Bold, 28pt
  - Color: White
- **Title Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Semibold, 16pt
  - Color: White 90% opacity
- **Institution Typography**:
  - Font: SF Pro Text, Regular, 14pt
  - Color: White 80% opacity
- **Action Buttons**:
  - Style: Pill buttons
  - Background: White 20% opacity, blur effect
  - Text: White
  - Icons: SF Symbols
  - Spacing: 12pt between buttons

#### Stats Bar
- **Layout**: 3-column grid
- **Background**: White with 95% opacity
- **Border**: 1pt gray stroke, corner radius 12pt
- **Cell Layout**:
  - Top: Large number (24pt, Bold)
  - Bottom: Label (12pt, Secondary color)
  - Dividers: 1pt vertical lines between cells
- **Padding**: 16pt vertical, edge-to-edge horizontal

#### Content Sections
All sections follow consistent pattern:
- **Header**:
  - Chevron indicator (expandable/collapsible)
  - Title: 18pt, Semibold
  - Padding: 16pt vertical
- **Card Background**:
  - Color: `.systemBackground`
  - Border: 1pt `.separator` color
  - Corner radius: 12pt
  - Padding: 20pt
  - Shadow: subtle elevation
- **Content Spacing**: 12pt between items

---

## Program Profile

### Purpose
The program profile is the sport-specific showcase that represents the entire athletic program, facilities, team culture, and recruiting opportunities.

### Layout Design

```

  []  Program Profile        [Edit]   <- Navigation

                                       
    <- Hero Banner
     [Stadium/Facility Photo]           (Full-width image)
                                      
                          
      Program                      
       Logo                        
                          
                                      
     University of Texas             
     Volleyball Program              
                                      
      Big 12 Conference            
     Division I - NCAA               
   
                                       
      <- Quick Stats
    Founded     Conf.      Nat.    
     1975      Titles: 8  Rank:5   
     
                                       
      <- Tab Navigation
   Overview  Roster  Facilities    
     
                                       
   Program Overview                   <- Content Sections
   
   The University of Texas           
   volleyball program is one of...   
   
                                       
   Recent Achievements               
   
    2023 Big 12 Champions          
    NCAA Tournament Sweet 16       
    #5 National Ranking            
   
                                       
   Program Culture & Values          
   
   Excellence  Teamwork  Integrity 
                                      
   We develop champions on and       
   off the court...                  
   
                                       
   Recruiting Priorities             
   
   Class of 2025                     
     
     Middle Blocker (Priority)   
     Outside Hitter              
     Setter                      
     
                                      
   Class of 2026                     
     
     Libero (Priority)           
     Outside Hitter              
     
   
                                       
   Academic Support                  
   
    Academic Excellence Center     
    Dedicated study halls           
    Individual tutoring             
    Career counseling               
                                      
    Team Academic Stats            
    3.6 Average GPA                 
    100% Graduation Rate            
    12 Academic All-Americans       
   
                                       
   Coaching Staff                    
   
    Dr. Sarah Johnson      [] 
       Head Coach                 
    15 years experience         
                                      
    Mike Anderson          [] 
       Assistant Coach            
    8 years experience          
                                      
    Lisa Chen              [] 
       Recruiting Coordinator     
    5 years experience          
   
                                       
   Facilities                        
   
   [Photo Gallery - Horizontal]      
                                      
    Gregory Gymnasium               
    4,000 seat capacity             
    State-of-art video system       
    Practice courts: 3              
                                      
    Longhorn Training Center       
    Dedicated strength facility     
    Sports medicine clinic          
    Recovery pools & equipment      
   
                                       
   Schedule & Results                
   
   2024 Season: 24-6 (14-2 Conf.)   
                                      
   Recent Matches                    
    W vs. Baylor      3-1           
    W vs. Kansas      3-0           
    L at Oklahoma     2-3           
   
                                       
   Alumni Success Stories            
   
   [Horizontal scroll cards]         
               
    Pro   Pro  Coach          
               
   
                                       

```

### Roster Tab Layout

```

  Overview  ROSTER  Facilities        <- Active Tab

                                       
  Current Roster (2024-25)            
   
   Filter: [All] [Class] [Position]  
   
                                       
   Seniors (4)                       
     
     #12 Emma Rodriguez           
       Outside Hitter               
     6'1"  Dallas, TX             
                                
     
  [Similar cards for other players]   
                                       
   Juniors (5)                       
   Sophomores (4)                    
   Freshmen (6)                      
                                       
   
    Interested in joining?           
    [Contact Coaching Staff]         
   
                                       

```

### Player Card Component

```

       Outside Hitter

## Navigation Patterns

### Profile Switching

**Method 1: Profile Hub (Recommended)**
- Central hub accessed from Profile tab
- Visual cards for each profile type
- Clear separation of contexts

**Method 2: Segmented Control**
```

    
    Personal    Program Profile   
    

  [Profile content based on selection] 

```

**Method 3: Contextual Linking**
- Cross-link between profiles
- "View Associated Program" button on personal profile
- "Meet the Coaching Staff" on program profile

### Navigation Hierarchy

```
Main Tab Bar
 Feed
 Search
 AI Assistant
 Messages
 Profile (College Coach)
     Profile Hub (Landing)
        Personal Coach Profile
           Edit Personal Info
           View as Athlete
           Settings
       
        Program Profile
            Edit Program Info
            Manage Roster
            Update Facilities
            Post Updates
            View as Athlete
    
     Settings
```

### Transitions

**Profile Hub to Profile**
- Push navigation (slide from right)
- Maintains navigation stack
- Back button returns to hub

**Between Personal and Program**
- Cross-fade transition
- Maintains scroll position preference
- Smooth visual continuity

**Edit Mode**
- Modal presentation (sheet)
- Full-screen on iPhone
- Card style on iPad
- Dismiss gesture enabled

#### Profile Card Component

```swift
struct ProfileCard: View {
    let title: String
    let icon: String
    let description: String
    let action: () -> Void

    var body: some View {
        Button(action: action) {
            HStack(spacing: 16) {
                Image(systemName: icon)
                    .font(.system(size: 24))
                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
                    .frame(width: 50, height: 50)
                    .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                    .clipShape(Circle())

                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                    Text(title)
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    Text(description)
                        .font(.subheadline)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        .lineLimit(2)
                }

                Spacer()

                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
            }
            .padding(20)
            .background(Color(.systemGray6))
            .cornerRadius(16)
        }
        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())
    }
}
```

struct SectionHeader: View {

    @Binding var isExpanded: Bool

            HStack {
                Image(systemName: "chevron.right")

                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                Text(title)
                    .font(.title3)
                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)

        .buttonStyle(PlainButtonStyle())

}

## Data Models

### Coach Model (Enhanced)

```swift
struct CoachProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var title: String           // Head Coach, Assistant Coach, etc.
    var profileImageURL: String?
    var bio: String

    // Professional Details
    var yearsExperience: Int
    var eduEmail: String
    var phone: String?
    var officeLocation: String?

    // Education & Credentials
    var education: [Education]
    var certifications: [Certification]

    // Coaching Philosophy
    var philosophy: String?

    // Career Highlights
    var highlights: [String]
    var awards: [Award]

    // Association
    var programId: String       // Links to Program Profile
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String
    var sport: String

    // Social & Contact
    var socialLinks: SocialLinks

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isVerified: Bool

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct Education: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var degree: String          // B.S., M.S., Ph.D., etc.
    var field: String           // Exercise Science, etc.
    var institution: String
    var graduationYear: Int
}

struct Certification: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String            // AVCA Certified, etc.
    var issuingOrganization: String
    var issueDate: Date
    var expirationDate: Date?
}

struct Award: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct SocialLinks: Codable {
    var twitter: String?
    var instagram: String?
    var linkedin: String?
    var personalWebsite: String?
}
```

### Program Profile Model

```swift
struct ProgramProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String

    // Basic Information
    var programName: String     // "University of Texas Volleyball"
    var sport: String
    var schoolId: String
    var schoolName: String

    // Branding
    var logoURL: String?
    var heroImageURL: String?
    var primaryColor: String    // Hex color
    var secondaryColor: String  // Hex color

    // Program Details
    var division: String        // NCAA Division I
    var conference: String      // Big 12
    var founded: Int?
    var overview: String

    // Team Culture
    var cultureValues: [String] // ["Excellence", "Teamwork", "Integrity"]
    var cultureDescription: String

    // Achievements
    var conferenceChampionships: Int
    var nationalChampionships: Int
    var currentRanking: Int?
    var recentAchievements: [Achievement]

    // Academic
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicSupport: AcademicSupport

    // Recruiting
    var recruitingPriorities: [RecruitingPriority]

    // Roster
    var roster: [PlayerProfile]

    // Facilities
    var facilities: [Facility]

    // Coaching Staff
    var coachingStaff: [CoachReference]

    // Schedule & Results
    var currentSeasonRecord: SeasonRecord?
    var recentMatches: [MatchResult]

    // Alumni
    var featuredAlumni: [AlumniProfile]

    // Metadata
    var createdAt: Date
    var updatedAt: Date
    var isPublished: Bool
}

struct Achievement: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var title: String
    var icon: String            // SF Symbol name
    var year: Int
    var description: String?
}

struct AcademicSupport: Codable {
    var description: String
    var resources: [String]     // ["Study halls", "Tutoring", etc.]
    var teamGPA: Double?
    var graduationRate: Double?
    var academicAllAmericans: Int?
}

struct RecruitingPriority: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var graduatingClass: String // "Class of 2025"
    var positions: [PositionNeed]
}

struct PositionNeed: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var position: String        // "Middle Blocker"
    var isPriority: Bool
    var quantity: Int           // Number of recruits needed
    var description: String?
}

struct PlayerProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var jerseyNumber: Int
    var firstName: String
    var lastName: String
    var position: String
    var classYear: String       // "Freshman", "Sophomore", etc.
    var height: String          // "6'1\""
    var hometown: String
    var highSchool: String?
    var photoURL: String?
    var starRating: Int?        // 1-5 stars
    var stats: PlayerStats?

    var fullName: String {
        "\(firstName) \(lastName)"
    }
}

struct PlayerStats: Codable {
    var kills: Int?
    var blocks: Int?
    var aces: Int?
    var digs: Int?
    var assists: Int?
    // Sport-specific stats can be added
}

struct Facility: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var type: FacilityType
    var description: String
    var features: [String]
    var imageURLs: [String]
    var capacity: Int?
    var openedYear: Int?
    var renovatedYear: Int?
}

enum FacilityType: String, Codable {
    case arena = "Arena"
    case trainingCenter = "Training Center"
    case academic = "Academic Facility"
    case lockerRoom = "Locker Room"
    case sportsMedicine = "Sports Medicine"
    case other = "Other"
}

struct CoachReference: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var coachProfileId: String  // Links to CoachProfile
    var name: String
    var title: String
    var photoURL: String?
    var yearsExperience: Int?
}

struct SeasonRecord: Codable {
    var season: String          // "2024"
    var wins: Int
    var losses: Int
    var conferenceWins: Int
    var conferenceLosses: Int
}

struct MatchResult: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var date: Date
    var opponent: String
    var isHome: Bool
    var result: MatchResultType
    var score: String           // "3-1", "3-0", etc.
}

enum MatchResultType: String, Codable {
    case win = "W"
    case loss = "L"
}

struct AlumniProfile: Identifiable, Codable {
    let id: String
    var name: String
    var graduationYear: Int
    var currentRole: String     // "Professional Player", "Coach", etc.
    var description: String
    var photoURL: String?
}
```

#### ProfileHubView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct ProfileHubView: View {
    @StateObject private var viewModel = ProfileHubViewModel()
    @State private var navigateToCoachProfile = false
    @State private var navigateToProgramProfile = false

    var body: some View {
        NavigationStack {
            ZStack {
                // Background gradient
                LinearGradient(
                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [
                        Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
                        Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
                    ]),
                    startPoint: .topLeading,
                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
                )
                .ignoresSafeArea()

                ScrollView {
                    VStack(spacing: 24) {
                        // Header Section
                        headerSection
                            .padding(.top, 20)

                        // Profile Type Cards
                        VStack(spacing: 16) {
                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "person.fill",
                                title: "Personal Profile",
                                description: "View and manage your coaching credentials",
                                iconColor: .blue
                            ) {
                                navigateToCoachProfile = true
                            }

                            ProfileTypeCard(
                                icon: "building.2.fill",
                                title: "\(viewModel.programName) Program",
                                description: "Manage your team's recruiting presence",
                                iconColor: .orange
                            ) {
                                navigateToProgramProfile = true
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        // Recent Activity
                        activitySection
                            .padding(.horizontal, 20)

                        Spacer(minLength: 40)
                    }
                }
            }
            .navigationTitle("Profile Hub")
            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.large)
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToCoachProfile) {
                CoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.coachViewModel)
            }
            .navigationDestination(isPresented: $navigateToProgramProfile) {
                ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)
            }
        }
    }

    private var headerSection: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 12) {
            // Profile Photo
            AsyncImage(url: URL(string: viewModel.profileImageURL)) { image in
                image
                    .resizable()
                    .aspectRatio(contentMode: .fill)
            } placeholder: {
                Image(systemName: "person.circle.fill")
                    .resizable()
                    .foregroundColor(.gray)
            }
            .frame(width: 120, height: 120)
            .clipShape(Circle())
            .overlay(
                Circle()
                    .stroke(Color.white, lineWidth: 4)
            )
            .shadow(radius: 10)

            // Name and Title
            Text(viewModel.coachName)
                .font(.title2)
                .fontWeight(.bold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            Text(viewModel.title)
                .font(.subheadline)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.9))

            Text(viewModel.schoolName)
                .font(.footnote)
                .foregroundColor(.white.opacity(0.7))
        }
    }

    private var activitySection: some View {
        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
            Text("Recent Activity")
                .font(.title3)
                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                .foregroundColor(.white)

            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(viewModel.recentActivity) { activity in
                    ActivityRowView(activity: activity)
                }
            }
            .padding(16)
            .background(
                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                    .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.3))
                    .overlay(
                        RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                            .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.2), lineWidth: 1)
                    )
            )
        }
    }
}
```

#### CoachProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

struct CoachProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: CoachProfileViewModel
    @State private var showingEditView = false
    @State private var expandedSections: Set<String> = []

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Section
                CoachHeroSection(
                    profileImageURL: viewModel.profileImageURL,
                    name: viewModel.fullName,
                    title: viewModel.title,
                    schoolName: viewModel.schoolName,
                    programColors: viewModel.programColors,
                    onMessage: { viewModel.initiateMessage() },
                    onConnect: { viewModel.connect() }
                )

                // Stats Bar
                StatsBarView(
                    stats: [
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.yearsExperience)", label: "Years Experience"),
                        Stat(value: "\(viewModel.titlesWon)", label: "Titles Won"),
                        Stat(value: viewModel.division, label: "Division")
                    ]
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)  // Overlap with hero

                // Content Sections
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    // About Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "About",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("about")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("about")
                    } content: {
                        Text(viewModel.bio)
                            .font(.body)
                            .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Credentials Section
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Credentials & Education",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("credentials")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("credentials")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.education) { edu in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "graduationcap.fill",
                                    title: "\(edu.degree) \(edu.field)",
                                    subtitle: edu.institution,
                                    iconColor: .blue
                                )
                            }

                            ForEach(viewModel.certifications) { cert in
                                CredentialRow(
                                    icon: "seal.fill",
                                    title: cert.name,
                                    subtitle: cert.issuingOrganization,
                                    iconColor: .green
                                )
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Philosophy Section
                    if let philosophy = viewModel.philosophy {
                        ExpandableSection(
                            title: "Coaching Philosophy",
                            isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("philosophy")
                        ) {
                            toggleSection("philosophy")
                        } content: {
                            Text(philosophy)
                                .font(.body)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                .padding(20)
                        }
                    }

                    // Career Highlights
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Career Highlights",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("highlights")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("highlights")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                            ForEach(viewModel.highlights, id: \.self) { highlight in
                                HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 8) {
                                    Text("")
                                        .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                    Text(highlight)
                                        .font(.body)
                                        .foregroundColor(.primary)
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }

                    // Associated Program Link
                    NavigationLink(destination: ProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel.programViewModel)) {
                        HStack {
                            Image(systemName: "building.2.fill")
                                .foregroundColor(.orange)

                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                                Text("Associated Program")
                                    .font(.caption)
                                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)

                                Text(viewModel.programName)
                                    .font(.body)
                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
                            }

                            Spacer()

                            Image(systemName: "chevron.right")
                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                        .background(Color(.systemGray6))
                        .cornerRadius(12)
                    }

                    // Contact Information
                    ExpandableSection(
                        title: "Contact Information",
                        isExpanded: expandedSections.contains("contact")
                    ) {
                        toggleSection("contact")
                    } content: {
                        VStack(spacing: 12) {
                            ContactRow(icon: "envelope.fill", value: viewModel.email)
                            if let phone = viewModel.phone {
                                ContactRow(icon: "phone.fill", value: phone)
                            }
                            if let office = viewModel.officeLocation {
                                ContactRow(icon: "building.fill", value: office)
                            }
                        }
                        .padding(20)
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Coach Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.isOwnProfile {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditCoachProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private func toggleSection(_ section: String) {
        withAnimation(.spring()) {
            if expandedSections.contains(section) {
                expandedSections.remove(section)
            } else {
                expandedSections.insert(section)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

#### ProgramProfileView.swift

```swift
import SwiftUI

enum ProgramTab: String, CaseIterable {
    case overview = "Overview"
    case roster = "Roster"
    case facilities = "Facilities"
}

struct ProgramProfileView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: ProgramProfileViewModel
    @State private var selectedTab: ProgramTab = .overview
    @State private var showingEditView = false

    var body: some View {
        ScrollView {
            VStack(spacing: 0) {
                // Hero Banner
                ProgramHeroSection(
                    heroImageURL: viewModel.heroImageURL,
                    logoURL: viewModel.logoURL,
                    programName: viewModel.programName,
                    conference: viewModel.conference,
                    division: viewModel.division,
                    gradientColors: viewModel.gradientColors
                )

                // Quick Stats
                QuickStatsView(
                    founded: viewModel.founded,
                    conferenceTitles: viewModel.conferenceChampionships,
                    nationalRanking: viewModel.currentRanking
                )
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, -30)

                // Tab Navigation
                TabBarView(selectedTab: $selectedTab)
                    .padding(.top, 20)

                // Tab Content
                VStack(spacing: 16) {
                    switch selectedTab {
                    case .overview:
                        overviewContent
                    case .roster:
                        rosterContent
                    case .facilities:
                        facilitiesContent
                    }
                }
                .padding(.horizontal, 20)
                .padding(.top, 20)
                .padding(.bottom, 40)
            }
        }
        .background(Color(.systemBackground))
        .navigationTitle("Program Profile")
        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
        .toolbar {
            ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
                if viewModel.canEdit {
                    Button("Edit") {
                        showingEditView = true
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditView) {
            EditProgramProfileView(viewModel: viewModel)
        }
    }

    private var overviewContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Program Overview
            ContentSection(title: "Program Overview") {
                Text(viewModel.overview)
                    .font(.body)
                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
            }

            // Recent Achievements
            ContentSection(title: "Recent Achievements") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recentAchievements) { achievement in
                        AchievementBadge(
                            icon: achievement.icon,
                            title: achievement.title,
                            subtitle: String(achievement.year)
                        )
                    }
                }
            }

            // Culture & Values
            ContentSection(title: "Program Culture & Values") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    HStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(viewModel.cultureValues, id: \.self) { value in
                            Text(value)
                                .font(.caption)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
                                .padding(.horizontal, 12)
                                .padding(.vertical, 6)
                                .background(Color.blue.opacity(0.1))
                                .cornerRadius(16)
                        }
                    }

                    Text(viewModel.cultureDescription)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
                }
            }

            // Recruiting Priorities
            ContentSection(title: "Recruiting Priorities") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 16) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.recruitingPriorities) { priority in
                        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
                            Text(priority.graduatingClass)
                                .font(.subheadline)
                                .fontWeight(.semibold)
                                .foregroundColor(.primary)

                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
                                ForEach(priority.positions) { position in
                                    RecruitingPriorityCard(
                                        position: position.position,
                                        isPriority: position.isPriority
                                    )
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // Academic Support
            ContentSection(title: "Academic Support") {
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text(viewModel.academicSupport.description)
                        .font(.body)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    if let gpa = viewModel.academicSupport.teamGPA,
                       let gradRate = viewModel.academicSupport.graduationRate {
                        HStack(spacing: 20) {
                            StatsPill(
                                value: String(format: "%.1f", gpa),
                                label: "Team GPA"
                            )
                            StatsPill(
                                value: "\(Int(gradRate))%",
                                label: "Grad Rate"
                            )
                        }
                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
                    }
                }
            }

            // Coaching Staff
            ContentSection(title: "Coaching Staff") {
                VStack(spacing: 12) {
                    ForEach(viewModel.coachingStaff) { coach in
                        NavigationLink(destination: CoachProfileDetailView(coachId: coach.id)) {
                            CoachStaffRow(coach: coach)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var rosterContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            // Filter Options
            HStack(spacing: 12) {
                ForEach(["All", "Seniors", "Juniors", "Sophomores", "Freshmen"], id: \.self) { filter in
                    FilterChip(title: filter, isSelected: viewModel.selectedFilter == filter) {
                        viewModel.selectedFilter = filter
                    }
                }
            }

            // Roster by Class
            ForEach(viewModel.rosterByClass, id: \.classYear) { section in
                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
                    Text("\(section.classYear) (\(section.players.count))")
                        .font(.headline)
                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

                    VStack(spacing: 12) {
                        ForEach(section.players) { player in
                            PlayerCardView(player: player)
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    private var facilitiesContent: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            ForEach(viewModel.facilities) { facility in
                FacilityCardView(facility: facility)
            }
        }
    }
}
```

---

## View Modes

### Edit Mode vs View Mode

#### Edit Mode Features

**Personal Coach Profile Edit Mode:**
- Inline editing of all text fields
- Photo upload capabilities
- Add/remove credentials
- Reorder highlights
- Preview toggle
- Save/Cancel buttons in toolbar

**Program Profile Edit Mode:**
- Multi-section edit interface
- Bulk roster import
- Facility photo management
- Recruiting priority editor
- Color theme customization
- Draft/Publish status

#### View Mode Context

**Coach Viewing Own Profile:**
- Edit button visible
- Analytics visible (views, engagement)
- Privacy settings accessible
- Quick actions prominent

**Athlete Viewing Coach Profile:**
- Contact buttons prominent
- Social proof emphasized
- Related programs suggested
- Save/bookmark option
- Share functionality

**Athlete Viewing Program Profile:**
- Contact coaching staff prominent
- Application/interest form
- Comparison tools
- Similar programs suggested
- Virtual tour access

---

## Accessibility Considerations

### WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance

#### Color Contrast
- All text maintains 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
- Large text (>18pt) maintains 3:1 ratio
- Interactive elements have clear focus states
- Program colors validated for accessibility

#### Navigation
- Clear heading hierarchy (H1  H6)
- Skip navigation links
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Keyboard navigation support

#### Screen Reader Support
- Semantic HTML/SwiftUI elements
- ARIA labels on custom components
- Alt text for all images
- Descriptive link text

#### Interactive Elements
- Minimum tap target: 44x44pt
- Clear focus indicators
- Error messages clearly associated
- Form validation feedback

#### Motion & Animation
- Respect reduced motion settings
- No auto-playing videos
- Pause/stop controls for carousels
- Animation duration < 5 seconds

### VoiceOver Optimization

```swift
// Example VoiceOver implementation
Image(systemName: "envelope.fill")
    .accessibilityLabel("Email")
    .accessibilityHint("Contact coach via email")

Button(action: { /* action */ }) {
    Text("View Program")
}
.accessibilityLabel("View University of Texas Volleyball Program")
.accessibilityHint("Navigates to program profile")
```

---

## Implementation Checklist

### Phase 1: Core Structure
- [ ] Data models created
- [ ] View model architecture established
- [ ] Profile Hub view implemented
- [ ] Navigation flow working
- [ ] Basic styling applied

### Phase 2: Personal Profile
- [ ] Coach profile view complete
- [ ] Edit mode implemented
- [ ] Credentials section working
- [ ] Contact information functional
- [ ] Photo upload working

### Phase 3: Program Profile
- [ ] Program overview complete
- [ ] Roster management working
- [ ] Facilities section implemented
- [ ] Tab navigation functional
- [ ] Edit mode complete

### Phase 4: Integration
- [ ] API service integration
- [ ] Image upload/storage
- [ ] Real-time updates
- [ ] Search integration
- [ ] Analytics tracking

### Phase 5: Polish
- [ ] Accessibility audit
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Error handling
- [ ] Loading states
- [ ] Empty states
- [ ] Offline support

---

## Future Enhancements

### Version 2.0 Features
1. **Video Integration**: Coach introduction videos, facility tours
2. **Interactive Timeline**: Career progression visualization
3. **Recruit Messaging**: Built-in communication tools
4. **Calendar Integration**: Schedule visits, camps
5. **Analytics Dashboard**: Profile performance metrics
6. **Virtual Tours**: 3D facility exploration
7. **Comparison Tools**: Side-by-side program comparison
8. **Scholarship Calculator**: Financial aid estimation
9. **Application Tracking**: Recruit interest pipeline
10. **Social Feed**: Program updates and news

### Advanced Features
- AI-powered recruit matching
- Video analysis integration
- Parent portal access
- Multi-language support
- Export to PDF/print
- QR code sharing
- NFC business card integration

---

## Conclusion

This design system provides a comprehensive foundation for the dual-profile college coach system in ATHLEAD. The separation between personal coach profiles and program profiles allows for detailed, context-appropriate information presentation while maintaining platform consistency and usability.

**Key Success Metrics:**
- Profile completion rate > 85%
- Athlete engagement time > 3 minutes
- Message conversion rate > 15%
- Mobile performance score > 90

**Design Principles Summary:**
1. Clear information hierarchy
2. Mobile-first responsive design
3. Accessibility as core feature
4. Performance optimization
5. Consistent user experience
6. Scalable component system

---

## Appendix

### Related Files
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/Coach.swift` - Existing coach model
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Models/School.swift` - School model reference
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Profile/ProfileView.swift` - Athlete profile pattern
- `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Auth/CollegeCoachProfileSetupView.swift` - Onboarding flow

### Design Resources
- SF Symbols catalog: https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols/
- Human Interface Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/
- WCAG 2.1 Guidelines: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/

### Contact
For questions or clarifications about this design system, consult the ATHLEAD design team or reference the existing profile implementations in the codebase.

   195
   196                                HStack {

   200
   201                                    if showConfirmPassword {

   203                                            .autocapitalization(.none)
   204                                    } else {
   205                                        SecureField("Re-enter Password", text: $confirmPassword)
   206                                            .autocapitalization(.none)
   207                                    }
   208
   209                                    Button {
   210                                        showConfirmPassword.toggle()
   211                                    } label: {

   229                        } else {

   231                            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
   232                                Text("Educational Email Address")
   233                                    .font(.subheadline)
   234                                    .fontWeight(.medium)
   235                                    .foregroundColor(.primary)
   236
   237                                HStack {

   239                                        .foregroundColor(.gray)
   240                                        .frame(width: 20)
   241

   243                                        .foregroundColor(.primary)

   246
   247                                    if isEduEmail {

   256                                }

   262                                    .font(.caption)

   264                            }
   265
   266                            // First Name
   267                            FormField(

   272                            )
   273
   274                            // Last Name

   279                                text: $lastName

   282
   283                        // Phone Number (optional)
   284                        FormField(
